%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@b%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@g%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@s%r@h%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@O%r@l%r@d%r@ %R@T%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@I%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@A%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@h%r@a%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@I%r@s%r@a%r@a%r@c%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@J%r@a%r@c%r@o%r@b%r@.%r@’%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@v%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@.%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%R@U%r@@%R@B%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@f%r@-%r@b%r@a%r@s%r@e%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@8One of the designated teachers%u@[%u@j%u@] heard them debating and seeing how well he replied to them asked him, “Which is the most important%u@[%u@k%u@] commandment?” %u@2%u@9Jesus answered, %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@m%r@p%r@o%r@r%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@H%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@s%r@r%r@a%r@e%r@l%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@L%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@L%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@,%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@.%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@c%r@o%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@p%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@b%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@.%r@’%r@ %R@T%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@.%r@” %u@3%u@2The designated teacher said to him, “Well-said, teacher, you really hit the nail on the head%u@[%u@m%u@], since, ‘He is One and there is no other one than Him,’ %u@3%u@3plus the %i@q%i@u%i@o%i@t%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n ‘…to love him from the entire heart and from the entire conscience and from the entire strength,’ plus the %i@q%i@u%i@o%i@t%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n ‘…to love a neighbor as yourself’ exceeds all burnt offerings and sacrifices%u@[%U@C%u@].” %u@3%u@4Jesus, seeing that he got it, replied, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@o%r@o%r@s%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@l%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@h%r@i%r@p%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@(%r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@)%r@.%r@” No one had the guts to ask him anything else any more.%vn~
          %u@3%u@5After some thought, Jesus proceeded to speak, teaching in the temple, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@i%r@g%r@n%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@j%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@a%r@h%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@D%r@a%r@v%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@o%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@H%r@o%r@l%r@y%r@ %R@S%r@p%r@i%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@,%r@%vn~
%r@%si~
%r@”%R@A%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@-%r@p%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@f%r@u%r@l%r@ %R@L%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@,%r@%vp~
%R@B%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@-%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@%vp~
%R@U%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@ %R@I%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@c%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@b%r@d%r@u%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@e%r@m%r@i%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@b%r@j%r@u%r@g%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@%vp~
%r@%si~
%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%r@”%R@D%r@a%r@v%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@c%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@p%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@?%r@”%r@ The crowd, which was large, listened to him with delight.%nn~
          %u@3%u@8He continued his teaching by saying to them, %r@“%R@O%r@b%r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@i%r@g%r@n%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@r%r@k%r@e%r@t%r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@q%r@u%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@r%r@o%r@b%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@c%r@c%r@u%r@p%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@i%r@g%r@i%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@s%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%R@U%r@@%R@D%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@y%r@n%r@a%r@g%r@o%r@g%r@u%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@n%r@q%r@u%r@e%r@t%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@b%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@d%r@o%r@w%r@s%r@’%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%R@U%r@@%R@E%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@-%r@w%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@a%r@y%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@:%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@u%r@y%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@q%r@u%r@i%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@r%r@s%r@h%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@q%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@j%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@g%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@y%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@4%u@1He seated himself across from the collection basket, and watched and watched people, just what %i@a%i@m%i@o%i@u%i@n%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@f money%u@[%u@r%u@] they were tossing into the basket; the rich people were tossing in great amounts. %u@4%u@2This one widow came and tossed in a couple of dollars%u@[%u@s%u@]. %u@4%u@3He called his disciples over and said, %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@-%r@t%r@o%r@-%r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@:%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@d%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@l%r@s%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@t%r@r%r@i%r@b%r@u%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@i%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@a%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@c%r@k%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@c%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@.%r@”%vn~
%sf~
%u@[%u@a%u@]%i@a%i@n%i@a%i@l%i@o%i@g%i@y%i@…Lit: %i@p%i@a%i@r%i@a%i@b%i@l%i@e%fn~
%u@[%u@b%u@]%i@a%i@ %i@f%i@e%i@n%i@c%i@e%i@…Lit: %i@a%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@d%i@g%i@e%i@%fn~
%u@[%u@c%u@]%I@T%i@h%i@e%i@y%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@o%i@k%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m%i@,%i@ %i@k%i@i%i@c%i@k%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m%i@ %i@o%i@u%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@v%i@i%i@n%i@e%i@y%i@a%i@r%i@d%i@,%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@k%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m…Lit: %I@T%i@h%i@e%i@y%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@o%i@k%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m%i@,%i@ %i@k%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m%i@,%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@d%i@r%i@o%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m%i@ %i@o%i@u%i@t%i@s%i@i%i@d%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@v%i@i%i@n%i@e%i@y%i@a%i@r%i@d. The sequence of events was re-arranged to match the sequence from Matt 21:39. Also, same wording for %i@k%i@i%i@c%i@k%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m%i@ %i@o%i@u%i@t%i@ as is used in Luke 13:28; ref. note there.%fn~
%u@[%u@d%u@]%I@H%i@e%i@r%i@o%i@d%i@ %i@s%i@u%i@p%i@p%i@o%i@r%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@s%i@…Lit: %I@H%i@e%i@r%i@o%i@d%i@i%i@a%i@n%i@s%fn~
%u@[%u@e%u@]%i@s%i@i%i@n%i@c%i@e%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@’%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@t%i@ %i@a%i@f%i@f%i@e%i@c%i@t%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@b%i@y%i@ %i@p%i@e%i@o%i@p%i@l%i@e%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@t%i@t%i@i%i@t%i@u%i@d%i@e%i@s…Lit: %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@n%i@’%i@t%i@ %i@l%i@o%i@o%i@k%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@f%i@a%i@c%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@n%i@.%i@ Ref. notes of Matt. 22:16.%fn~
%u@[%u@f%u@]%i@c%i@o%i@i%i@n%i@…Lit: %i@d%i@e%i@n%i@a%i@r%i@i%i@u%i@s%fn~
%u@[%u@g%u@]%i@w%i@h%i@o%i@ %i@c%i@l%i@a%i@i%i@m%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@i%i@s%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@ %i@l%i@i%i@f%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@f%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@d%i@e%i@a%i@t%i@h%i@…Lit: %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@ %i@s%i@a%i@y%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@i%i@s%i@n%i@’%i@t%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@r%i@e%i@s%i@u%i@r%i@r%i@e%i@c%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n. The word %i@r%i@e%i@s%i@u%i@r%i@r%i@e%i@c%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n%i@ here means %i@l%i@i%i@f%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@f%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@d%i@e%i@a%i@t%i@h%i@.%i@%fn~
%u@[%u@h%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@O%i@l%i@d%i@ %I@T%i@e%i@s%i@t%i@a%i@m%i@e%i@n%i@t%i@…Lit: %I@M%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@w%i@r%i@o%i@t%i@e or %I@M%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@s. The Law of Moses or the Torah, in other words.%fn~
%u@[%u@i%u@]%i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@e%i@x%i@i%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@l%i@i%i@k%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@g%i@e%i@l%i@s%i@ %i@e%i@x%i@i%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@p%i@i%i@r%i@i%i@t%i@u%i@a%i@l%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@r%i@l%i@d…Lit: %i@b%i@u%i@t%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@s%i@t%i@e%i@a%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@y%i@ %i@a%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@l%i@i%i@k%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@g%i@e%i@l%i@s%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@n%i@l%i@i%i@e%i@s. Also of note: in this passage, the word %i@y%i@o%i@u is inserted instead of the actual word used in the GT, %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@y.%fn~
%u@[%u@j%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@d%i@e%i@s%i@i%i@g%i@n%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@e%i@a%i@c%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@s%i@…Lit: %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@S%i@c%i@r%i@i%i@b%i@e%i@s. Ref. note of Matt. 7:29.%fn~
%u@[%u@k%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@m%i@o%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@i%i@m%i@p%i@o%i@r%i@t%i@a%i@n%i@t%i@…Lit: %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@f%i@i%i@r%i@s%i@t%fn~
%u@[%u@l%u@]%i@e%i@n%i@t%i@i%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@l%i@i%i@f%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@…Lit: %i@s%i@o%i@u%i@l%fn~
%u@[%u@m%u@]%i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@r%i@e%i@a%i@l%i@l%i@y%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@n%i@a%i@i%i@l%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@a%i@d%i@…Lit: %i@a%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@r%i@u%i@t%i@h%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@s%i@p%i@o%i@k%i@e%fn~
%u@[%u@n%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@M%i@e%i@s%i@s%i@i%i@a%i@h%i@…Lit: %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@C%i@h%i@r%i@i%i@s%i@t%fn~
%u@[%u@o%u@]%I@U%i@n%i@t%i@i%i@l%i@ %I@I%i@ %i@d%i@e%i@c%i@i%i@d%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@s%i@u%i@b%i@d%i@u%i@e%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@r%i@ %i@e%i@n%i@e%i@m%i@i%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@s%i@u%i@b%i@j%i@u%i@g%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@m%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u…Ref. note of Matt. 22:44%fn~
%u@[%u@p%u@]%i@d%i@e%i@s%i@c%i@e%i@n%i@d%i@a%i@n%i@t%i@…Lit: %i@s%i@o%i@n%fn~
%u@[%u@q%u@]%i@q%i@u%i@i%i@t%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@r%i@s%i@h%i@ %i@s%i@e%i@n%i@t%i@e%i@n%i@c%i@e…Lit: %i@a%i@n%i@ %i@e%i@x%i@c%i@e%i@e%i@d%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@l%i@y%i@ %i@a%i@b%i@u%i@n%i@d%i@a%i@n%i@t%i@ %i@s%i@e%i@n%i@t%i@e%i@n%i@c%i@e. A figure of speech.%fn~
%u@[%u@r%u@]%i@j%i@u%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@a%i@m%i@o%i@u%i@n%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@m%i@o%i@n%i@e%i@y%i@…Consisting of coins of various amounts%fn~
%u@[%u@s%u@]%i@a%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@u%i@p%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@l%i@l%i@a%i@r%i@s%i@…lit: %i@a%i@ %i@t%i@w%i@o%i@-%i@l%i@e%i@p%i@t%i@a%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@i%i@n. This is about the lowest denomination coin that was in circulation at the time.%fn~
%u@[%u@t%u@]%i@e%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@y%i@t%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@s%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@l%i@i%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@n…This phrase is a repetition of the phrase %i@e%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@y%i@ %i@c%i@e%i@n%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@s%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@d. Such repetition is a figure of speech.%fn~
%fn~
%u@[%U@A%u@]%i@t%i@e%i@a%i@c%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@…Mark uses the Gk. word for %i@t%i@e%i@a%i@c%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ here and not the Aramaic %I@R%i@a%i@b%i@b%i@i%i@ used several verses earlier (ref. Mark 9:5; 11:21). The shift in Mark’s choice of the word for %i@t%i@e%i@a%i@c%i@h%i@e%i@r here shows a subtle lack of affection and respect seeping out of the mouths of the Pharisees and Herodians (and later in v.19, the Sadducees), while they are trying to flatter Jesus. %fn~
%u@[%U@B%u@]%I@G%i@o%i@d%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@t%i@ %i@a%i@ %I@G%i@o%i@d%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@d%i@e%i@a%i@d%i@ %i@b%i@u%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@l%i@i%i@v%i@i%i@n%i@g…The point Jesus is making is that in the story of the burning bush, when God speaks to Moses, he refers to Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob, who had died many years earlier, in the present tense, not in the past tense. If there was no life-after-death, he would have referred to them in the past tense; his referring to them in the present tense is proof that they still exist even though they’re dead.%fn~
%u@[%U@C%u@]%i@e%i@x%i@c%i@e%i@e%i@d%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@b%i@u%i@r%i@n%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@f%i@e%i@r%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@s%i@a%i@c%i@r%i@i%i@f%i@i%i@c%i@e%i@s…The Law of Moses in the Old Testament commands Jews to offer to God burnt offerings and sacrifices. Both the commandments quoted in this passage and burnt offerings and sacrifices are required by the self-same Law of Moses.%fn~
%u@[%U@D%u@]%i@o%i@c%i@c%i@u%i@p%i@y%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@m%i@o%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@e%i@s%i@t%i@i%i@g%i@i%i@o%i@u%i@s%i@ %i@s%i@e%i@a%i@t%i@s…Lit: %i@f%i@i%i@r%i@s%i@t%i@-%i@s%i@e%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@d %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@y%i@n%i@a%i@g%i@o%i@g%i@u%i@e%i@s%i@.%i@ In the Israel of the Bible, seating at any event, even ones not steeped in formality, was done by the relative ranking of those seated; the greater status of the guest, the closer to the front or closer to the host or most prominent attendee was he placed. This explains Luke 14:8.%fn~
%u@[%U@E%u@]%i@g%i@o%i@b%i@b%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@u%i@p%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@d%i@o%i@w%i@s%i@’%i@ %i@h%i@o%i@m%i@e%i@s%i@…Widows were the lowest ranked and most vulnerable in the socio-economic hierarchy of ancient Israel. There are numerous admonitions in the Old Testament to care for widows, to not take advantage of them, to look out for their well-being.%fn~
%i@%sb~
Mark Chapter 13%hb~
          %u@1While leaving the temple, one of his disciples %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ says, “Teacher, look—what %i@b%i@r%i@e%i@a%i@t%i@h%i@t%i@a%i@k%i@i%i@n%i@g stones and edifices.” %u@2Jesus said to him, %r@“%R@S%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@e%r@d%r@i%r@f%r@i%r@c%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@?%r@ %R@N%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@m%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@p%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@r%r@n%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@.%r@” %u@3Sitting across from temple on the Mount of Olives alone with Peter, James, John, and Andrew, %u@4they asked him %i@c%i@o%i@n%i@f%i@i%i@d%i@e%i@n%i@t%i@i%i@a%i@l%i@l%i@y, “When will these things take place, and what will be the sign%u@[%u@a%u@] indicating when the conclusion%u@[%u@b%u@] of all things is supposed to happen?” %u@5Jesus began by saying to them, %r@“%R@S%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@f%r@-%r@b%r@a%r@s%r@e%r@;%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@l%r@a%r@i%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@I%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@-%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@-%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@y%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@,%r@’%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%R@U%r@@%R@A%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@h%r@q%r@u%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@;%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@b%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@s%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@F%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@;%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %sf~
%u@[%u@a%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@e%u@ %i@s%i@i%i@g%i@n%i@…Also: %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@o%i@r%i@t%i@e%i@n%i@t; %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@m%i@e%i@n; %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@u%i@p%i@e%i@r%i@n%i@a%i@t%i@u%i@r%i@a%i@l%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@n%i@d%i@e%i@r%fn~
%u@[%u@b%u@]%i@c%i@o%i@n%i@c%i@l%i@u%i@s%i@i%i@o%i@n%i@…Or: %i@c%i@o%i@n%i@s%i@u%i@m%i@m%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n%fn~
%u@[%u@c%u@]%i@c%i@l%i@a%i@i%i@m%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@a%i@u%i@t%i@h%i@o%i@r%i@i%i@t%i@y…Lit: %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@n%i@a%i@m%i@e. Ref. notes of Matt. 24:4, Luke 21:8.%fn~

%u@[%u@k%u@]%i@n%i@o%i@t%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@s%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@l%i@i%i@v%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@i%i@n%i@g…Lit: %i@n%i@o%i@ %i@f%i@l%i@e%i@s%i@h%fn~
%u@[%u@l%u@]%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@c%i@c%i@o%i@u%i@n%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@C%i@h%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@n%i@ %I@O%i@n%i@e%i@s%i@…Lit: %i@o%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@c%i@c%i@o%i@u%i@n%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@C%i@h%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@n%i@ %I@O%i@n%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@c%i@h%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@n. The repetition in the phrase %I@C%i@h%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@n%i@ %I@O%i@n%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@c%i@h%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@n%i@ is a figure of speech.%fn~
%u@[%u@m%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@M%i@a%i@n%i@…Lit: %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@S%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %I@M%i@a%i@n. Ref. note of Matt. 8:20.%fn~
%u@[%u@n%u@]%i@f%i@r%i@o%i@m%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@i%i@d%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@l%i@a%i@n%i@e%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@…Ref. note of Matt. 24:31%fn~
%u@[%u@o%u@]%i@p%i@e%i@r%i@i%i@o%i@d%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@t%i@o%i@r%i@y%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@m%i@a%i@n%i@k%i@i%i@n%i@d …Lit: %i@g%i@e%i@n%i@e%i@r%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n%fn~
%u@[%u@p%u@]%i@t%i@i%i@m%i@e%i@f%i@r%i@a%i@m%i@e%i@…Lit: %i@w%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@e%i@a%i@s%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@%fn~
%u@[%u@q%u@]%i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@v%i@a%i@r%i@i%i@o%i@u%i@s%i@ %i@e%i@s%i@t%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@h%i@o%i@p%i@s%i@…Lit: %i@e%i@a%i@c%i@h%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@r%i@k%i@s. These are his business ventures…warehouses, glass-making, tanneries, potteries, wineries…perhaps herds, fields, silos.%fn~
%u@[%u@r%u@]%i@a%i@p%i@p%i@l%i@i%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@a%i@s%i@ %i@w%i@e%i@l%i@l%i@…Lit: %i@w%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %I@I%i@’%i@m%i@ %i@t%i@e%i@l%i@l%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@a%i@l%i@l%i@,%i@ %I@I%i@’%i@m%i@ %i@s%i@a%i@y%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@e%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@y%i@o%i@n%i@e%i@%fn~
%fn~
%u@[%U@A%u@]%I@I%i@ %i@a%i@m%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@e%i@-%i@a%i@n%i@d%i@-%i@o%i@n%i@l%i@y%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@e%i@…Lit: %I@I%i@ %i@a%i@m. Same words Jesus spoke in John 8:58, which in turn is a repetition of Exod. 3:14. Saying “I am” implies saying “I am the eternal God incarnate.”%fn~
%u@[%U@B%u@]%I@T%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@l%i@o%i@c%i@a%i@l%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@u%i@n%i@c%i@i%i@l…In this context, though it could refer to the national council (which was like a Supreme Court), the Sanhedrin, which in Matthew is called the %I@C%i@o%i@u%i@n%i@c%i@i%i@l%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@E%i@l%i@d%i@e%i@r%i@s, but more likely refers to a local tribunal of elders.%fn~
%u@[%U@C%u@]%i@h%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@ %i@r%i@e%i@a%i@d%i@s%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@u%i@t%i@ %i@l%i@o%i@u%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@n%i@g%i@r%i@e%i@g%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@g%i@e%i@t%i@ %i@u%i@p%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@s%i@p%i@e%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@h%i@e%i@a%i@d%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@i%i@m%i@e…Ref. note of Matt. 24:15%fn~
%u@[%U@D%u@]%I@D%i@o%i@n%i@’%i@t%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@e%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@o%i@r%i@c%i@h%i@ %i@g%i@o%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@w%i@n%i@,%i@ %i@g%i@o%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@,%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@f%i@e%i@t%i@c%i@h%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@y%i@t%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@o%i@u%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@o%i@u%i@s%i@e%i@…Ref. note of Matt. 24:17%fn~
%u@[%U@E%u@]%I@O%i@h%i@,%i@ %i@h%i@o%i@w%i@ %i@t%i@e%i@r%i@r%i@i%i@b%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@i%i@t%i@’%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@r%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@m%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@i%i@m%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@ %i@a%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@e%i@g%i@n%i@a%i@n%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@r%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@f%i@a%i@n%i@t%i@s%i@!…Ref. note of Matt. 24:19%fn~
%u@[%U@F%u@]%i@k%i@e%i@e%i@p%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@t%i@c%i@h%i@…%i@s%i@t%i@a%i@y%i@ %i@a%i@l%i@e%i@r%i@t%i@…%i@s%i@t%i@a%i@y%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@c%i@u%i@s%i@e%i@d%i@…Lit: %i@k%i@e%i@e%i@p%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@t%i@c%i@h. The GT uses the same word for %i@k%i@e%i@e%i@p%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@t%i@c%i@h%i@ at the end of v.34 (%i@k%i@e%i@e%i@p%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@t%i@c%i@h), at the beginning of v. 35 (%i@s%i@t%i@a%i@y%i@ %i@a%i@l%i@e%i@r%i@t), and at the end of v. 37 (%i@s%i@t%i@a%i@y%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@c%i@u%i@s%i@e%i@d). %fn~
%u@[%U@G%u@]%i@w%i@h%i@e%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@a%i@t%i@ %i@d%i@a%i@y%i@b%i@r%i@e%i@a%i@k%i@…The times listed in v.35 (sunset, middle of the night, just before daybreak, daybreak) are all times when it is dark or nearly dark and are listed in the order of the Jewish day. In other words, since the Jewish day starts at sunset, the hours of darkness or near darkness progress from sunset to the middle of the night, just before daybreak, and finally to daybreak. Also, in the GT, Mark inserts the word %i@w%i@h%i@e%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ before each time…%i@w%i@h%i@e%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@a%i@t%i@ %i@s%i@u%i@n%i@s%i@e%i@t%i@,%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@e%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@m%i@i%i@d%i@d%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@n%i@i%i@g%i@h%i@t%i@,%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@e%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@j%i@u%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@f%i@o%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@d%i@a%i@y%i@b%i@r%i@e%i@a%i@k%i@,%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@e%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@d%i@a%i@y%i@b%i@r%i@e%i@a%i@k. His point is to cover the entire night, from beginning to end, starting when it begins to get dark and ending when it’s still a bit dark in the morning.%fn~
%u@[%U@H%u@]%I@B%i@u%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@o%i@i%i@n%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %I@I%i@’%i@m%i@ %i@m%i@a%i@k%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@s%i@t%i@o%i@r%i@y%i@ %i@a%i@p%i@p%i@l%i@i%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@a%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@a%i@s%i@ %i@w%i@e%i@l%i@l…In this parable, the servants are all assigned responsibilities, and their responsibilities by default include keeping watch during the day, as they’ll be up and about minding shop during daylight hours, but do not included keeping watch at night. The job of keeping the night watch is assigned solely to the doorman. If the estate owner were to come in the middle of the night and catch everyone asleep, it will be the doorman’s fault and not the servants’, since the servants are expected to sleep at night. The doorman is the lowest ranking servant on the estate (the Gk. word for %i@d%i@o%i@o%i@r%i@m%i@a%i@n%i@ is alternatively translated %i@p%i@o%i@r%i@t%i@e%i@r or %i@j%i@a%i@n%i@i%i@t%i@o%i@r); the servants are assigned more important duties. The doorman’s temptation is to neglect his night watch duties, as the servants, those senior to him, will sleep through the night and therefore not keep tabs on him. The admonition Jesus makes is for the doorman (and us by extension) to stay alert every night, throughout the entire night, as the estate owner could come at any time.%fn~
%i@%sb~
Mark Chapter 14%hb~
          %u@1Now in two days the Passover and the Feast of Unleavened Bread was scheduled to start. The chief priests and the designated teachers%u@[%u@a%u@] were looking and looking for a way to use %i@s%i@o%i@m%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@o%i@r%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@f trickery to get ahold of him and kill him. %u@2In this regard, they kept on saying, “Not in %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@m%i@i%i@d%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@f the festival, lest the people riot.”%vn~
          %u@3While staying in Bethany, in Simon the leper’s house, while he was sitting at the dinner table%u@[%u@b%u@], a woman with a jar of fragrant ointment%u@[%u@c%u@]—the pure, genuine expensive %i@s%i@t%i@u%i@f%i@f—went up to him, cracked%u@[%U@A%u@] the jar open, and poured it all out on his head. %u@4Now some of them %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@ %i@w%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@e were furious, %i@c%i@o%i@m%i@p%i@l%i@a%i@i%i@n%i@i%i@n%i@g amongst themselves, “What does her wasting of this ointment accomplish? %u@5The fact is, this ointment here could’ve been sold for upwards of $30,000%u@[%u@d%u@], and %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@o%i@c%i@e%i@e%i@d%i@s%i@ donated to the poor.” They were fuming with indignation over her. %u@6But Jesus said, %r@“%R@L%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@—%r@w%r@h%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@s%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@?%r@ %R@S%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@v%r@o%r@r%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@S%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@e%r@m%r@b%r@a%r@l%r@m%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@d%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@h%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@r%r@i%r@a%r@l%r@           %u@1%u@0Judas Iscariot, one of the Twelve, left to meet up with the chief priests, in order for him to deliver %I@J%i@e%i@s%i@u%i@s into their custody. %u@1%u@1When they heard %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@o%i@p%i@o%i@s%i@a%i@l, they were delighted and promised to give him a wad of cash%u@[%u@g%u@]. They began to look for an opportune moment to apprehend him.%vn~
          %u@1%u@2On the first day of the Feast of Unleavened Bread, %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@d%i@a%i@y%i@ when they slaughtered the Passover sacrifice, his disciples, querying him, say, “Where do you want us to venture out to, to make the arrangements for you to partake of the Passover meal?” %u@1%u@3He dispatched two of his disciples telling them, %r@“%R@G%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@r%r@r%r@y%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@c%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@;%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@W%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@P%r@a%r@s%r@s%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@c%r@i%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@?%r@’%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@r%r@g%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@r%r@o%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@r%r@a%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@u%r@s%r@.%r@” %u@1%u@6The disciples departed and went into the city and found %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@s%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@b%i@e just like he told them, and they made the Passover meal arrangements.%vn~
          %u@1%u@7When it got to be late in the day, he arrived with the Twelve. %u@1%u@8While they were dining and relaxing%u@[%u@h%u@], Jesus said, %r@“%R@M%r@a%r@r%r@k%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@s%r@—%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@n%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@t%r@r%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@” %u@1%u@9They became deeply upset, and they went on and on, one after another, telling him, “It’s not me.” %u@2%u@0But he said, %r@“%r@%%R@I%r@@%R@I%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@’%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@b%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@T%r@w%r@e%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@r%r@a%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@a%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@f%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%R@U%r@@%R@B%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@—%r@s%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@a%r@j%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@o%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@c%r@i%r@f%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@b%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@y%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@v%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@S%r@c%r@r%r@i%r@p%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@l%r@k%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@ %R@B%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@p%r@p%r@r%r@e%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@s%r@u%r@l%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@t%r@r%r@a%r@y%r@a%r@l%r@;%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@u%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@’%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@r%r@n%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@2While still eating, he took a loaf of bread, gave thanks, broke it%u@[%U@C%u@], gave it to them, and said, %r@“%R@T%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@.%r@ %R@T%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@d%r@y%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@2%u@3He took a cup, gave thanks, gave it to them, %u@2%u@4and said, %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@l%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%R@U%r@@%R@D%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@h%r@a%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@y%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@s%r@o%r@l%r@u%r@t%r@e%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@k%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@y%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@j%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@(%r@i%r@n%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@)%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@d%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@k%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@h%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@2%u@6After they sang some hymns, they left for the Mount of Olives.%vn~
          %u@2%u@7Jesus %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ says to them, %r@“%R@A%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@f%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@y%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@k%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@w%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@n%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%R@I%r@@%R@S%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@p%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@,%r@%vn~
%r@%si~
%r@“%R@I%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@r%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@p%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@d%r@,%r@%vp~
%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@c%r@a%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@%vp~
%r@%si~
%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%r@”%R@B%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@—%r@a%r@f%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@s%r@u%r@r%r@r%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@h%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %R@G%r@a%r@l%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@e%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@2%u@9Peter said to him, “Even if everyone else falls out, I won’t, uh-uh.” %u@3%u@0Jesus said to him, %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@f%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@o%r@o%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@o%r@w%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@w%r@i%r@c%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@n%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@3%u@1All the more vehemently he kept on saying, “%I@E%i@v%i@e%i@n if I have to die with you, I won’t deny you—no way!” The others, one after another, were saying the same thing.%nn~
          %u@3%u@2They went to a place called Gethsemane, and he said to his disciples, %r@“%R@S%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@a%r@y%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@.%r@” %u@3%u@3He took along with him Peter, James, and John and started to become gripped with agony and consternation. %u@3%u@4He, in the midst of it, says, %r@“%R@M%r@y%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@-%r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@i%r@e%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@:%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@c%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@” %u@3%u@5He wandered out a bit and fell on the ground and began to pray and pray, praying if it’s possible that this hour pass him by. %u@3%u@6In the midst of that he was saying, %r@“%R@A%r@b%r@b%r@a%r@—%r@m%r@y%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@—%r@b%r@y%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@:%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@.%r@ %R@B%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@s%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@3%u@7He went and found them sleeping and %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ says to Peter, %r@“%R@S%r@i%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@l%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@?%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@a%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@c%r@u%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%r@%%R@I%r@@%R@E%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@v%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@c%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@a%r@y%r@e%r@r%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@i%r@a%r@l%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@k%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@p%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@;%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@i%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@u%r@n%r@g%r@-%r@h%r@o%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@q%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@u%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@n%r@a%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@a%r@k%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@3%u@9Again, he went out and prayed the same prayer, %u@4%u@0and again he found them sleeping; they didn’t know what they would say in response to him since their eyelids were sagging%u@[%U@E%u@]. %u@4%u@1He came a third time and said to them, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@s%r@l%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@?%r@—%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@—%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@:%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@G%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@,%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@;%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@i%r@l%r@i%r@t%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@r%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@4%u@3Right away, while he was still speaking, Judas, one of the Twelve, showed up with a large party %i@a%i@r%i@m%i@e%i@d%i@ with swords and clubs %i@s%i@e%i@n%i@t from the chief priests, designated teachers, and councilmen%u@[%u@t%u@]. %u@4%u@4His betrayer had set up a signal ahead of time, saying, “Whomever I greet with a kiss, seize him, secure him, and take him away.” %u@4%u@5He went straight over to him and %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ says, “Teacher%u@[%u@u%u@],” and kissed him cordially. %u@4%u@6They laid their hands on him and grabbed ahold of him. %u@4%u@7One of the men standing there with%i@ %I@J%i@e%i@s%i@u%i@s %i@(%i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@s%i@s%i@o%i@c%i@i%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@s%i@,%i@ %i@s%i@u%i@p%i@p%i@o%i@r%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@s%i@,%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@d%i@e%i@f%i@e%i@n%i@d%i@e%i@r%i@s%i@)%i@ unsheathed a sword, attacked the chief priest’s slave, and sliced off his ear. %u@4%u@8Jesus considered what had happened and said to the party%u@[%U@F%u@], %r@“%r@%%R@I%r@@%R@S%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@i%r@z%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@s%r@w%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@l%r@u%r@b%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@c%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@u%r@g%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@D%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@m%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@p%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@x%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@a%r@b%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@?%r@ %R@A%r@n%r@y%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@—%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@p%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@p%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@f%r@u%r@l%r@f%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@S%r@c%r@r%r@i%r@p%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@.%r@” %u@5%u@0Everyone who was standing there with%u@[%U@F%u@] %I@J%i@e%i@s%i@u%i@s%i@ deserted him and began to flee. %u@5%u@1A certain young man%u@[%U@G%u@] (a teenager) tagged along behind him, clothed %i@o%i@n%i@l%i@y in a linen garment around his private parts. They grabbed him, %u@5%u@2but he shed the garment %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@y%i@ %i@g%i@r%i@a%i@b%i@b%i@e%i@d%i@ and ran away naked.%u@[%U@H%u@]%vn~
          %u@5%u@3They took Jesus away to the high priest, and all the chief priests, the councilmen, and the designated teachers gathered together there. %u@5%u@4Peter followed him from a distance, until he was within the courtyard of the chief priest’s %i@d%i@o%i@m%i@i%i@c%i@i%i@l%i@e, and he took a seat alongside the attendants, warming himself up next to the %i@f%i@i%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@u%i@s%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@s%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e light source. %u@5%u@5Now the chief priests and all the councilmen were trying to find someone to testify under oath%u@[%u@v%u@] against Jesus in order to sentence him to death, but they weren’t having any success finding anyone. %u@5%u@6To that ends, many were saying phony things against him in court under oath, but the testimonies weren’t compelling. %u@5%u@7Some of the ones taking the witness stand and testifying against him were saying, %u@5%u@8”We personally heard him say, ‘I’ll tear down this man-made temple myself, and in three days I’ll build another one, one that’s not man-made’,” %u@5%u@9but this testimony wasn’t adequate enough %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@o%i@d%i@u%i@c%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@g%i@u%i@i%i@l%i@t%i@y%i@ %i@v%i@e%i@r%i@d%i@i%i@c%i@t%i@ either. %u@6%u@0The high priest stood up in front of everyone and, by means of inquiry, asked Jesus, “You don’t have anything to say in response to those who’ve testified against you?” %u@6%u@1He kept silent and wouldn’t say anything in response. Again, the high priest asked him, “Are you the Messiah, the Christ, the Blessed Son?”, %u@6%u@2and he said, %r@“%R@I%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@-%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@-%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@y%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@w%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@.%r@ %R@A%r@n%r@d%r@,%r@%vn~
%r@%si~
%r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@%vp~
%R@I%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@r%r@o%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@f%r@u%r@l%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@-%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@x%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@%vp~
%R@C%r@o%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@l%r@o%r@u%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@k%r@y%r@”%r@%vp~
%si~
          %u@6%u@3Then the high priest became unglued and in a rage starting breaking things,%u@[%u@y%u@] all the while saying, “What further testimony do we need? %u@6%u@4You all heard the blasphemy; what’s it looking like to you?” So everyone %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ sentenced him to death. %u@6%u@5Some of them began to go about spitting on him, blindfolding him, and striking him, saying to him, “Prophesy.” And %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n the attendants took him and slapped him %i@a%i@r%i@o%i@u%i@n%i@d.%vn~
          %u@6%u@6Being outside in the courtyard, Peter was approached by one of the high priest’s servant girls. %u@6%u@7She saw Peter warming himself up, took a good hard look at him, and %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ says to him, “You too were with Jesus of Nazareth.” %u@6%u@8He denied it, saying, “I have no first-hand knowledge or understanding of what you’re saying,” and he left %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@u%i@r%i@t%i@y%i@a%i@r%i@d to go out to the porch. A rooster crowed.%u@[%U@I%u@] %u@6%u@9While looking at him, the servant girl began talking to the bystanders again, “This guy’s one of them.” %u@7%u@0He denied it again. Again, a bit later, the bystanders were saying to Peter, “Seriously—you’re one of them, since you’re a Galilean.” %u@7%u@1He began to cuss repeatedly and to swear by oaths, “I don’t know this person, whomever it is that you’re talking about.” %u@7%u@2Immediately a rooster crowed a second time%u@[%U@I%u@]. Peter remembered the statement which Jesus made, that before a rooster crows twice, you will have denied me three times. It hit him like a ton of bricks,%u@[%U@J%u@] and he started crying.%vn~

%u@[%u@j%u@]%i@w%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@g%i@e%i@n%i@e%i@r%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@d%u@ %i@f%i@r%i@o%i@m%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@v%i@i%i@n%i@e%i@y%i@a%i@r%i@d%i@…Lit: %i@f%i@r%i@o%i@m%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@o%i@d%i@u%i@c%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@v%i@i%i@n%i@e%i@y%i@a%i@r%i@d%i@.%i@ Saying this instead of simply saying %i@w%i@i%i@n%i@e is a figure of speech.%fn~
%u@[%u@k%u@]%i@f%i@a%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@o%i@u%i@t%i@…Or%i@:%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@ %i@w%i@r%i@o%i@n%i@g%i@;%i@ %i@f%i@a%i@l%i@l%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@p%i@a%i@r%i@t%i@;%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@s%i@s%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@u%i@p%i@;%i@ %i@f%i@a%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@a%i@w%i@a%i@y; %i@f%i@a%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@e%i@y%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@t%i@r%i@a%i@p; %i@f%i@a%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@s%i@h%i@o%i@r%i@t; %i@m%i@a%i@k%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@m%i@i%i@s%i@t%i@a%i@k%i@e; %i@g%i@e%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@f%i@ %i@o%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@t%i@o%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@t%i@c%i@h. %u@[%u@m%u@]%i@a%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@o%i@s%i@s%i@i%i@b%i@l%i@e%i@…Same wording as in Matt. 19:26, %I@A%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@o%i@s%i@s%i@i%i@b%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@t%i@h%i@ %I@G%i@o%i@d%fn~
%u@[%u@n%u@]%i@l%i@e%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@r%i@d%i@e%i@a%i@l%i@ %i@p%i@a%i@s%i@s%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@y%i@…Lit: %i@b%i@e%i@a%i@r%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@c%i@u%i@p%i@ %i@p%i@a%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@w%i@a%i@y%i@ %i@f%i@r%i@o%i@m%i@ %i@m%i@e%fn~
%u@[%u@o%u@]%i@e%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@m%i@o%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@t%i@a%i@y%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@c%i@u%i@s%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@a%i@y%i@e%i@r%i@…Lit: %i@w%i@a%i@t%i@c%i@h%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@a%i@y. Wording it this way instead of %i@p%i@r%i@a%i@y%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@t%i@c%i@h%i@f%i@u%i@l%i@l%i@y%i@ is a figure of speech. And also, the word %i@w%i@a%i@t%i@c%i@h in this context means %i@f%i@o%i@c%i@u%i@s. And also, the word %i@e%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@m%i@o%i@r%i@e%i@ amplifies the verb tense in %i@w%i@a%i@t%i@c%i@h%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@a%i@y%i@.%fn~
%u@[%u@p%u@]%i@r%i@e%i@a%i@c%i@h%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@o%i@i%i@n%i@t%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@r%i@i%i@a%i@l%i@s%i@ %i@c%i@a%i@n%i@ %i@b%i@r%i@e%i@a%i@k%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@…Lit: %i@s%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@n%i@’%i@t%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@m%i@e%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@t%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@e%i@m%i@p%i@t%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n. %I@T%i@e%i@m%i@p%i@t%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n here is testing to the breaking point, in addition to its commonly-understood meaning.%fn~
%u@[%u@q%u@]%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@g%i@u%i@n%i@g%i@-%i@h%i@o%i@…Also: %i@a%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@r%i@ %i@i%i@t; %i@d%i@e%i@s%i@i%i@r%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@i%i@t%i@ %i@p%i@a%i@s%i@s%i@i%i@o%i@n%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@l%i@y%fn~

%u@[%u@s%u@]%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@e%i@ %i@g%i@o%i@…Lit: %i@b%i@e%i@h%i@o%i@l%i@d%i@%fn~
