%u@[%u@b%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@d%i@e%i@s%i@i%i@g%i@n%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@e%i@a%i@c%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@s…Lit: %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@S%i@c%i@r%i@i%i@b%i@e%i@s%fn~
%u@[%u@c%u@]%i@h%i@e%i@a%i@r%i@t%i@i%i@l%i@y%i@ %i@w%i@e%i@l%i@c%i@o%i@m%i@e%i@s…Lit: %i@r%i@e%i@c%i@e%i@i%i@v%i@e%i@s%fn~
%u@[%u@d%u@]%I@I%i@’%i@m%i@ %i@s%i@o%i@ %i@g%i@l%i@a%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@e%i@x%i@c%i@i%i@t%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@c%i@a%i@u%i@s%i@e%i@ %I@I%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@u%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@m%i@i%i@s%i@s%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@s%i@h%i@e%i@e%i@p%i@.%i@ %I@H%i@i%i@g%i@h%i@-%i@f%i@i%i@v%i@e%i@s%i@!…Lit: %I@R%i@e%i@j%i@o%i@i%i@c%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@t%i@h%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@,%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@c%i@a%i@u%i@s%i@e%i@ %I@I%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@u%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@m%i@i%i@s%i@s%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@s%i@h%i@e%i@e%i@p%fn~
%u@[%u@e%u@]%I@A%i@ %i@c%i@e%i@r%i@t%i@a%i@i%i@n%i@ %i@m%i@a%i@n%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@w%i@o%i@ %i@s%i@o%i@n%i@s%i@,%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@i%i@s%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@ %i@e%i@x%i@p%i@e%i@r%i@i%i@e%i@n%i@c%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@t%i@h%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@m…The interpolation %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@i%i@s%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@ %i@e%i@x%i@p%i@e%i@r%i@i%i@e%i@n%i@c%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@t%i@h%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@m%i@ is insinuated by the verb tense of the word %i@h%i@a%i@d%i@ (which should actually be %i@w%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@v%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ instead) in %i@a%i@ %i@c%i@e%i@r%i@t%i@a%i@i%i@n%i@ %i@m%i@a%i@n%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@d%i@.%i@%fn~
%u@[%u@f%u@]%i@m%i@o%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@n%i@ %i@e%i@n%i@o%i@u%i@g%i@h%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@o%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@e%i@a%i@t…Lit: %i@a%i@b%i@o%i@u%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@l%i@o%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@b%i@r%i@e%i@a%i@d%fn~
%u@[%u@g%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@r%i@e%i@w%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@r%i@m%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@r%i@o%i@u%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@n%i@e%i@c%i@k…Lit%i@:%i@ %i@f%i@e%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@u%i@p%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@n%i@e%i@c%i@k. As the words %i@f%i@e%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@u%i@p%i@o%i@n in the Bible usually refer to one person or party attacking another, the fervency in which the father hugged him around the neck is both a metaphor to attacking someone and also an hyperbole.%fn~
%u@[%u@h%u@]%i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@a%i@l%i@w%i@a%i@y%i@s%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@l%i@w%i@a%i@y%i@s%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@t%i@h%i@ %i@m%i@e…Lit: %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@a%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@t%i@h%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@l%i@w%i@a%i@y%i@s%fn~
%fn~
%u@[%U@A%u@]%i@$%i@1%i@0%i@0%i@ %i@b%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@s…Lit: %i@d%i@r%i@a%i@c%i@h%i@m%i@a. Ref. note of Matt. 17:24 for conversion of drachmas to dollars.%fn~
%u@[%U@B%u@]%i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@e%i@s%i@e%i@n%i@c%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@g%i@e%i@l%i@s…Lit: %i@b%i@e%i@f%i@o%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@g%i@e%i@l%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %I@G%i@o%i@d. The angels of God in this context are the angels who surround God; the joy they are having is a metonymy for God’s joy, which extends to all heavenly beings surrounding Him.%fn~
%u@[%U@C%u@]%I@I%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@i%i@n%i@n%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@g%i@a%i@i%i@n%i@s%i@t%i@ %I@G%i@o%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@e%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@s%i@o%i@m%i@u%i@c%i@h%i@ %i@a%i@g%i@a%i@i%i@n%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u…Lit: %I@I%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@i%i@n%i@n%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@u%i@n%i@t%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@f%i@o%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u. The Jews say %i@h%i@e%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@n as a metonymy in place of God, to avoid speaking His name. His sin was “unto God” but it was before his father. In the Bible, before a person means that it is something that that person puts their focus and full attention on, and implies that that person is ever cognizant of.%fn~
%u@[%U@D%u@]%I@P%i@r%i@e%i@m%i@i%i@e%i@r%i@ %I@R%i@o%i@b%i@e…%i@r%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@r%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@f%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@e%i@r…Like Joseph’s robe of many colors, this Premier Robe (lit: %I@F%i@i%i@r%i@s%i@t%i@ %I@R%i@o%i@b%i@e) here is a visible indication of ranking and status. It shows that the son is reinstated to a position of authority in the family, having authority over the workers who report to the father. The ring is likely a signet ring, one used to affix the family seal on legal documents, giving him authority to transact business in the father’s name, similar to a credit card or even power of attorney.%fn~
%u@[%U@E%u@]%i@e%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@y%i@t%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %I@I%i@ %i@o%i@w%i@n%i@ %i@i%i@s%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@r%i@s…This remark indicates that the older son, the faithful one, had the right to do anything he wanted with his father’s possessions, as his father considered that the elder son had joint ownership of them. Notice the word %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@m%i@ is used in v. 12 and not the word %i@h%i@i%i@m: %i@h%i@e%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@s%i@t%i@r%i@i%i@b%i@u%i@t%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@e%i@s%i@t%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@m%i@o%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@m. This is further evidence that the father had given the faithful son full control over the entire estate. The older son’s problem is that he was waiting for the father to throw him a party; he could’ve thrown one himself.%fn~
%i@%sb~
Luke Chapter 16%hb~
          %u@1He proceeded to tell %i@s%i@o%i@m%i@e%i@t%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@e%i@l%i@s%i@e to the disciples. %r@“%R@A%r@ %r@c%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@r%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@u%r@s%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@f%r@f%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@q%r@u%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@W%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@?%r@ %R@E%r@x%r@p%r@l%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@b%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@;%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@m%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@.%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@W%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@s%r@i%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@?%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@-%r@b%r@o%r@d%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@e%r@l%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@u%r@l%r@t%r@i%r@v%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@i%r@l%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@d%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@g%r@g%r@a%r@r%r@…%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@I%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@g%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@s%r@i%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@i%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@(%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@.%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@.%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@,%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@k%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@k%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%R@I%r@@%R@I%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@’%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@k%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@f%r@)%r@.%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@m%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@b%r@t%r@o%r@r%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@v%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@g%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@q%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@           %u@1%u@4The money-loving Pharisees were monitoring these things he was saying and sneered at him. %u@1%u@5He said to them, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %u@[%u@i%u@]%i@a%i@ %i@s%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@t%i@r%i@o%i@k%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@i%i@c%i@h%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@s%i@t%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@u%i@i%i@s%i@h%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@e%i@ %i@l%i@e%i@t%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@f%i@r%i@o%i@m%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@o%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@B%i@i%i@b%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@v%i@a%i@l%i@i%i@d%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@d…Lit: %i@o%i@n%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@e%i@r%i@i%i@f%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@L%i@a%i@w%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@f%i@a%i@l%i@l%fn~
%u@[%u@j%u@]%I@E%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@y%i@o%i@n%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@ %i@g%i@e%i@t%i@s%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@v%i@o%i@r%i@c%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@r%i@e%i@m%i@a%i@r%i@r%i@i%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@m%i@m%i@i%i@t%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@d%i@u%i@l%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@y…Lit: %i@e%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@y%i@o%i@n%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@v%i@o%i@r%i@c%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@f%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@m%i@a%i@r%i@r%i@i%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@o%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@m%i@m%i@i%i@t%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@d%i@u%i@l%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@y%i@,%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@e%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@y%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@m%i@a%i@n%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@v%i@o%i@r%i@c%i@e%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@ %i@r%i@e%i@m%i@a%i@r%i@r%i@i%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@m%i@m%i@i%i@t%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@d%i@u%i@l%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@y. The GT is worded this way because only the husband had the legal right to obtain a divorce, not the wife.%fn~
%u@[%u@k%u@]%i@w%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@d%i@r%i@e%i@s%i@s%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@c%i@l%i@o%i@t%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@l%i@i%i@k%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@r%i@i%i@c%i@h%i@ %i@a%i@r%i@e…Lit: %i@w%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@c%i@l%i@o%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@p%i@u%i@r%i@p%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@f%i@i%i@n%i@e%i@ %i@l%i@i%i@n%i@e%i@n%i@%fn~
%u@[%u@l%u@]%i@l%i@i%i@v%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@g%i@h%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@o%i@g…Also: %i@s%i@u%i@m%i@p%i@t%i@u%i@o%i@u%i@s%i@l%i@y%i@%fn~
%u@[%u@m%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@B%i@i%i@b%i@l%i@e…Lit: %I@M%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@P%i@r%i@o%i@p%i@h%i@e%i@t%i@s%fn~
%u@[%u@n%u@]%i@s%i@t%i@r%i@a%i@i%i@g%i@h%i@t%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@u%i@p…Lit: %i@r%i@e%i@p%i@e%i@n%i@t%fn~
%fn~
%u@[%U@A%u@]%i@1%i@0%i@0%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@n%i@t%i@a%i@i%i@n%i@e%i@r%i@s…Lit: %i@1%i@0%i@0%i@ %i@b%i@a%i@t%i@h%i@s. A %i@b%i@a%i@t%i@h is an ancient Israeli unit of measurement equivalent to 5.8 gallons (21.9 liters). In all probability, olive oil containers like this consisted of large jars, pots, etc. of pottery that could hold a single bath. In today’s retail price for olive oil, one bath of olive oil would sell for around $240, setting the total value of all 100 baths at $23,000.%fn~
%u@[%U@B%u@]%i@1%i@0%i@0%i@ %i@b%i@a%i@r%i@r%i@e%i@l%i@s…Lit: %i@1%i@0%i@0%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@a%i@s%i@u%i@r%i@e%i@s. One %i@m%i@e%i@a%i@s%i@u%i@r%i@e was ten times larger than a bath, making a measure equal to 58 gallons (220 liters). For perspective, a barrel of crude oil is 42 gallons; a measure is 6 times larger than a bushel. In today’s prices, 100 baths (600 bushels) of wheat is valued around $3,000. Now, wheat production nowadays has been automated to a greater extent, relatively speaking, than other commodities, so the effective dollar equivalent value for us would exceed $3,000.%fn~
%u@[%U@C%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@ %i@g%i@o%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@t%i@h%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@f%i@l%i@o%i@w%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@w%i@f%i@u%i@l%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@r%i@l%i@d%i@-%i@s%i@y%i@s%i@t%i@e%i@m%i@ %i@a%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@h%i@r%i@e%i@w%i@d%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@l%i@l%i@o%i@w%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@l%i@i%i@g%i@h%i@t%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@i%i@t%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@m%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@d%i@e%i@a%i@l%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@t%i@h%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@i%i@r%i@ %i@o%i@w%i@n%i@ %i@k%i@i%i@n%i@d…Lit: %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@o%i@n%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@g%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@m%i@o%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@e%i@n%i@s%i@i%i@b%i@l%i@e%i@ [or:%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@u%i@d%i@e%i@n%i@t%i@;%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@s%i@e]%i@ %i@o%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@o%i@n%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@l%i@i%i@g%i@h%i@t%i@ %i@u%i@n%i@t%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@i%i@r%i@ %i@o%i@w%i@n%i@ %i@g%i@e%i@n%i@e%i@r%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n. A clearer meaning of the word %i@a%i@g%i@e as used in this verse can be found in Eph. 2:2.%fn~
%u@[%U@D%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@A%i@l%i@m%i@i%i@g%i@h%i@t%i@y%i@ %I@D%i@o%i@l%i@l%i@a%i@r%i@ %i@u%i@s%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@r%i@ %i@w%i@r%i@o%i@n%i@g%i@-%i@d%i@o%i@i%i@n%i@g…Lit%i@:%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@m%i@a%i@m%i@m%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@w%i@r%i@o%i@n%i@g%i@-%i@d%i@o%i@i%i@n%i@g. The Aramaic word %i@m%i@a%i@m%i@m%i@o%i@n used in the NT carries with it negative connotations. The word %i@w%i@r%i@o%i@n%i@g%i@-%i@d%i@o%i@i%i@n%i@g is a repetition of the “for the wrong-doing” (v. 8), as what Jesus says in v. 9 is a reference to that parable.%fn~
%u@[%U@E%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@y%i@ %i@j%i@u%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@m%i@i%i@g%i@h%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@a%i@k%i@e%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@t%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@n%i@d%i@o%i@s%i@ [%i@l%i@i%i@b%i@e%i@r%i@t%i@i%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@t%i@a%i@k%i@e%i@n%i@;%i@ lit:%i@ %i@t%i@e%i@n%i@t%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@r%i@ %i@t%i@a%i@b%i@e%i@r%i@n%i@a%i@c%i@l%i@e%i@s]%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@i%i@c%i@h%i@ %i@a%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@e%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@n%i@a%i@l…The wording of this sentence, along with the grammatical forms of these words, is a repetition of “they just might take me into their houses” ( v. 4), except %i@t%i@e%i@n%i@t%i@s is substituted for %i@h%i@o%i@u%i@s%i@e%i@s. Also, the word %i@t%i@e%i@n%i@t%i@s is a Semitic figure of speech used in the OT (like in 1 Kings 12:16) which uses words from the bygone-days of Israel that were bygone in Jesus’s time, as it hearkens back to the days before they were a nation but were nomads, like in the time of Abraham, still living in tents.%fn~
%u@[%U@F%u@]%i@c%i@u%i@s%i@t%i@o%i@d%i@i%i@a%i@n…Lit: %i@d%i@o%i@m%i@e%i@s%i@t%i@i%i@c%i@ %i@s%i@e%i@r%i@v%i@a%i@n%i@t. Not the usual words for servant, but a word having the same root as %i@a%i@c%i@c%i@o%i@u%i@n%i@t%i@ %i@m%i@a%i@n%i@a%i@g%i@e%i@r (%i@s%i@t%i@e%i@w%i@a%i@r%i@d) as used in this passage. Both %i@d%i@o%i@m%i@e%i@s%i@t%i@i%i@c%i@ %i@s%i@e%i@r%i@v%i@a%i@n%i@t and %i@s%i@t%i@e%i@w%i@a%i@r%i@d take care of someone else’s possessions. The words suggest that the domestic servant is in training or aspires to become a steward. As there is linking of the words for steward and domestic servant, v. 13 is a continuation of the parable of the steward.%fn~
%u@[%U@G%u@]%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@n%i@f%i@r%i@o%i@n%i@t%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@t%i@h%i@ %i@a%i@g%i@o%i@n%i@i%i@z%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@c%i@h%i@o%i@i%i@c%i@e%i@s…Lit: %i@s%i@u%i@f%i@f%i@e%i@r%i@s%i@ %i@v%i@i%i@o%i@l%i@e%i@n%i@c%i@e. The word for %i@s%i@u%i@f%i@f%i@e%i@r%i@s%i@ %i@v%i@i%i@o%i@l%i@e%i@n%i@c%i@e is an idiom; though the exact meaning is not entirely certain, it seems to mean that a person has to make difficult decisions to the point of undergoing hardships, of acting decisively, of exercising his willpower to the uttermost extent, and of challenging his most fundamental and sacred beliefs. Ref. Matt. 11:12.%fn~
%u@[%U@H%u@]%i@t%i@o%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@i%i@g%i@h%i@t%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@t%i@h%i@ %I@A%i@b%i@r%i@a%i@h%i@a%i@m%i@,%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@r%i@e%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@c%i@l%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m…Lit: %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@o%i@s%i@o%i@m%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %I@A%i@b%i@r%i@a%i@h%i@a%i@m. To a person to “be in the bosom of so-and-so” is for that person’s head to be in so-and-so’s lap while he’s reclined at the dinner table. Lazarus is reclined in such a way that his head is in Abraham’s lap, as John was in Jesus’s in John 13:23. “Abraham’s bosom” is a metaphor of close friendship, as the one who lies for a meal and places his head in another’s bosom is best of friends.%fn~
%u@[%U@I%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@r%i@l%i@d%i@-%i@t%i@o%i@-%i@c%i@o%i@m%i@e…Lit: %I@H%i@a%i@d%i@e%i@s. Hades is the Greek god of mythology who’s god of the underworld. It is also a synecdoche for the underworld itself, the place where people go after they die. The writers of the NT used the word %I@H%i@a%i@d%i@e%i@s%i@ in an abstract manner; in other words, they used it to refer to the place people go when they die. However, just because the NT uses the word Hades doesn’t mean that it concurs with all of what the Greeks thought of the underworld. It is simply the place where the dead go. As can be seen in this story, it consists of the place where both the good and the bad go after they die.%fn~
%u@[%U@J%u@]%i@s%i@e%i@n%i@d%i@ %I@L%i@a%i@z%i@a%i@r%i@u%i@s…There is evidence that Lazarus was at one time the rich man’s servant: first, because the rich man recognized Lazarus at a distance; second, because he knew his name; third, the fact that Lazarus was stationed at his front gate, not far from where he had once lived; fourth, that the rich man is asking for service from Lazarus, something he was accustomed to doing while alive. As it appears, when Lazarus became too old or too frail to perform his duties, the rich man tossed him out on the street, where he had to beg for the remainder of his life. The rich man’s wealth and lavish lifestyle wasn’t directly responsible for his punishment in the afterlife, but the wealth and deceitful lifestyle fueled a disdain for his fellow man, and that ultimately is what landed him in hell. There are commandments in the Old Testament for showing kindness to the less-fortunate; the rich man disobeyed these.%fn~
%i@%sb~
Luke Chapter 17%hb~
          %u@1He said to his disciples, %r@“%R@V%r@a%r@r%r@i%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@i%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@m%r@p%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@v%r@o%r@i%r@d%r@;%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@w%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@H%r@e%r@’%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@f%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@s%r@t%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@c%r@k%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@a%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@i%r@g%r@n%r@i%r@f%r@i%r@c%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@i%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@P%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@(%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@)%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@r%r@a%r@d%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@b%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@;%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@m%r@u%r@l%r@t%r@i%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@t%r@u%r@r%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@r%r@r%r@y%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@,%r@’%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@5The missionaries%u@[%u@d%u@] said to the Lord, “Boost our faith.” %u@6The Lord said, %r@“%R@I%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@m%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@c%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@u%r@l%r@b%r@e%r@r%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@B%r@e%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@r%r@o%r@o%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@p%r@l%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@a%r@,%r@’%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@b%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@.%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%r@”%R@W%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@…%r@a%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@p%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@d%r@…%r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@e%r@l%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@C%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@r%r@a%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@,%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@M%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@n%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%r@%%R@I%r@@%R@T%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@g%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@e%r@f%r@f%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@g%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@:%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@p%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@f%r@.%r@’%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@1%u@1While on the way to Jerusalem, he reached the point where he was starting to go through the middle of Samaria and Galilee. %u@1%u@2While he was entering a particular town, standing at a distance were ten men who were lepers, and these lepers encountered him. %u@1%u@3They raised their voices in unison, “Jesus, master, have mercy on us.” %u@1%u@4Seeing them, he said, %r@“%R@G%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@i%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@s%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%R@U%r@@%R@A%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@v%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@f%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@y%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@p%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@y%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@g%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@w%r@.%r@”%r@ And it so happened as they were on the way that they were purged%u@[%u@h%u@] %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@i%i@r%i@ %i@l%i@e%i@p%i@r%i@o%i@s%i@y. %u@1%u@5But one of them, seeing that he had been healed, returned glorifying God in a loud voice. %u@1%u@6He fell on his face at his feet thanking him. He, though, was a Samaritan. %u@1%u@7Jesus addressed him, %r@“%R@W%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@r%r@g%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@f%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@p%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@y%r@?%r@ %R@W%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@n%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@w%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@v%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@c%r@e%r@p%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@n%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%R@U%r@@%R@B%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@?%r@” %u@1%u@9He said to him, %r@“%R@G%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@.%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@s%r@c%r@u%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@2%u@0Asked by the Pharisees when God will roll out his plan for mankind (when God’s kingdom %i@i%i@s%i@ %i@e%i@x%i@p%i@e%i@c%i@t%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ come), his response was, %r@“%R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@b%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@y%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@w%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@-%r@t%r@o%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@b%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@n%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@l%r@k%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@L%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@k%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@v%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@j%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@.%r@’%r@ %R@G%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@h%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@:%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@v%r@o%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@ %r@(%R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@)%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@c%r@i%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@w%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@k%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@           %u@3%u@7In response they said%u@[%U@G%u@] to him, “Where %i@w%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@t%i@a%i@k%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@l%i@a%i@c%i@e, Lord?”%vn~

%u@[%u@l%u@]%I@D%i@o%i@n%i@’%i@t%i@ %i@g%i@o%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@l%i@d%i@ %i@g%i@o%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@c%i@h%i@a%i@s%i@e…Lit: %I@N%i@e%i@i%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@d%i@e%i@p%i@a%i@r%i@t%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@r%i@ %i@p%i@u%i@r%i@s%i@u%i@e. The wording of the GT suggests that this is an expression.%fn~
%u@[%u@m%u@]%i@w%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@l%i@i%i@v%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@i%i@t%i@ %i@u%i@p%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@n%i@-%i@s%i@t%i@o%i@p…Lit: %i@w%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@e%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@e%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@,%i@ %i@d%i@r%i@i%i@n%i@k%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@d%i@r%i@i%i@n%i@k%i@i%i@n%i@g%fn~
%u@[%u@n%u@]%i@f%i@l%i@a%i@m%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@s%i@u%i@l%i@f%i@u%i@r…Lit: %i@f%i@i%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@b%i@r%i@i%i@m%i@s%i@t%i@o%i@n%i@e. An expression used throughout the Bible. It’s a figure of speech where one should remove the word %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ between %i@f%i@i%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@b%i@r%i@i%i@m%i@s%i@t%i@o%i@n%i@e%i@.%i@%fn~
%u@[%u@o%u@]%i@l%i@y%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@s%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@d…Or possibly: %i@t%i@w%i@o%i@ %i@r%i@e%i@c%i@l%i@i%i@n%i@e%i@d%i@ [%i@f%i@o%i@r%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@n%i@n%i@e%i@r]%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@s%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@u%i@c%i@h.%fn~
%fn~
%u@[%U@A%u@]%I@G%i@o%i@ %i@s%i@h%i@o%i@w%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@r%i@s%i@e%i@l%i@v%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@i%i@e%i@s%i@t%i@s…Ref. note of Matt. 8:4; see also Luke 5:14%fn~
%u@[%U@B%u@]%i@w%i@h%i@o%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@o%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@n%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n%i@a%i@l%i@i%i@t%i@y…Ref. notes of Matt. 15:26, Mark 7:27%fn~
%u@[%U@C%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@M%i@a%i@n%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@a%i@m%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@y…The principle manuscripts are split evenly on this, with the alternate reading, %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@M%i@a%i@n%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@a%i@m%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@y%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@d%i@a%i@y%i@ %i@a%i@r%i@r%i@i%i@v%i@e%i@s%i@ [%i@l%i@i%i@t%i@:%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@d%i@a%i@y]. The added phrase or something to that effect was insinuated by Luke, so the interpolation is correct, though it’s doubtful that these words appeared in the autograph.%fn~
%u@[%U@D%u@]%i@o%i@u%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@a%i@c%i@k%i@ %i@d%i@e%i@c%i@k…Lit: %i@u%i@p%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@o%i@u%i@s%i@e%i@t%i@o%i@p. Some liberties taken. Ancient Israeli houses had flat roofs, and they used their roofs like we use porches and decks. Likewise, this explains Prov. 25:24.%fn~
%u@[%U@E%u@]%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@d%i@r%i@e%i@a%i@d%i@f%i@u%i@l%i@ %i@n%i@i%i@g%i@h%i@t…Lit: %i@w%i@i%i@t%i@h%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@n%i@i%i@g%i@h%i@t. Verse 31 starts out with Jesus saying %i@o%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@d%i@a%i@y, but now he’s talking about “that night” instead of “that day.” He’s actually speaking of the same day, but he switches to saying night to signal that something dreadful is to take place.%fn~
%u@[%U@F%u@]Verse 36 missing from the better manuscripts%fn~
%u@[%U@G%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@y%i@ %i@s%i@a%i@i%i@d…Lit: %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@y%i@ %i@s%i@a%i@y. In the NT, narrative commonly switches to the present tense for effect, when the past tense is the true meaning. This is a figure of speech which conveys to the reader how tightly the sequential actions in a narrative are coupled; that things are unfolding in real-time; the continuity of a conversation. The present tense puts the reader in the midst of the conversation as it’s unfolding, rather than looking at a stale description of how it turned out.%fn~
%i@%sb~
Luke Chapter 18%hb~
          %u@1He proceeded to tell them an analogy, to the effect that men must continuously pray, all the time, and not get tired %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@a%i@y%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ and give up, %u@2saying, %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@c%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@d%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@i%r@c%r@u%r@l%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@u%r@c%r@k%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@N%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@d%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@I%r@s%r@s%r@u%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@r%r@d%r@i%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@v%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@r%r@u%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@p%r@p%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@w%r@.%r@’%r@           %u@9Now he also addressed this analogy to some who reached the point that they’ve convinced themselves that their life is approved by God and they live up to His standards (that they’re %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@—%r@o%r@f%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@.%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@f%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@l%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@p%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@l%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@k%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@—%r@r%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@g%r@u%r@y%r@—%r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@a%r@l%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@a%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@a%r@s%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@a%r@l%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@1%u@5They kept on bringing the toddlers%u@[%U@A%u@] to him so that he’d affect them by touching them. Seeing this, the disciples scolded them. %u@1%u@6But Jesus called them (the toddlers) over, while saying, %r@“%R@D%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@w%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@y%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@r%r@l%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%R@U%r@@%R@B%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@;%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@R%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@l%r@e%r@-%r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@e%r@m%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@(%R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@)%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@r%r@l%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@—%r@n%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@1%u@8One of the rulers asked him,%vn~
      “Good teacher, what do I need to do so that I would be guaranteed to take possession of that special fullness of life (eternal life)?”%vn~
          %u@1%u@9Jesus said, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@‘%r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%R@U%r@@%R@C%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@?%r@ %R@N%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@c%r@e%r@p%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@A%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@m%r@i%r@l%r@i%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@:%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@m%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@d%r@u%r@l%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@;%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@u%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@;%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@;%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@k%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@i%r@f%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@p%r@o%r@s%r@i%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@r%r@t%r@;%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@n%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@?%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@2%u@1He said, “These I’ve been vigilant to keep%u@[%u@m%u@] since I was a youth.”%vn~
          %u@2%u@2Jesus heard this and said, %r@“%R@Y%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@p%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@f%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@p%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@z%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@z%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@:%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@p%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@o%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@i%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@u%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@c%r@i%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@2%u@3But having heard this, he became sad to the core; for he was exceedingly rich. %u@2%u@4Seeing him %i@b%i@e%i@c%i@o%i@m%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@a%i@d, Jesus said, %r@“%R@O%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@t%r@h%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@v%r@o%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@(%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@)%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@s%r@i%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@a%r@w%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@m%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@r%r@t%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@v%r@o%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %R@H%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@”%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%R@U%r@@%R@D%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %vn~
          %u@2%u@6Those who heard this said, “Just how can anyone avoid this?”%vn~
          %u@2%u@7He said, %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@m%r@p%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@o%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@2%u@8Peter said, “Consider this: in our case, we left what we owned and became your followers.”%vn~
          %u@2%u@9He said to them, %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@:%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@f%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@d%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@h%r@a%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@l%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@h%r@i%r@p%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@(%R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@)%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@f%r@r%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@c%r@i%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@u%r@l%r@l%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@ %r@(%r@e%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@)%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@C%r@o%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %R@E%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@%%R@I%r@@%R@T%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@f%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@—%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@3%u@1He took the Twelve aside and said to them, %r@“%R@T%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@i%r@c%r@e%r@:%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %R@J%r@e%r@r%r@u%r@s%r@a%r@l%r@e%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@%%R@I%r@@%R@T%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@p%r@h%r@e%r@t%r@s%r@           %u@3%u@5Now an incident occurred while drawing near to Jericho. On the side of the road a particular blind man was sitting around begging. %u@3%u@6Having heard that a crowd was coming through, he asked repeatedly what it was all about. %u@3%u@7He was told that the Nazarene %i@n%i@a%i@m%i@e%i@d%i@ Jesus was passing by. %u@3%u@8He began to shout out to Jesus, “You marvelous godsend%u@[%u@o%u@], have mercy on me!” %u@3%u@9Those %i@f%i@r%i@o%i@m%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@c%i@r%i@o%i@w%i@d%i@ who passed by scolded him repeatedly, in order to get him to keep quiet. He, though, even more so continued crying out, “You marvelous godsend, have mercy on me.” %u@4%u@0Jesus came to a halt and called to have him sent over to him. He came nearby, and he asked him,%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@”%R@W%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@p%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@?%r@”%r@%vn~
      ”Lord, %i@d%i@o%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@i%i@t%i@ %i@i%i@s%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@d%i@o so that I would gain my sight.”%vn~
          %u@4%u@2Jesus said, %r@“%R@S%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@:%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@!%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@s%r@c%r@u%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@q%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@4%u@3Immediately he gained his sight and became his follower, all the while glorifying God. Upon seeing this, the entire crowd offered up praise to God.%vn~

%u@[%u@j%u@]%i@s%i@t%i@a%i@n%i@d%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@b%i@a%i@c%i@k%i@ %i@a%i@t%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@s%i@t%i@a%i@n%i@c%i@e%i@,%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@m%i@i%i@d%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@a%i@y%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@t%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@n%i@t%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@—%i@e%i@v%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@l%i@i%i@g%i@h%i@t%i@e%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@y%i@—%i@t%i@o%i@ %i@l%i@i%i@f%i@t%i@ %i@u%i@p%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@e%i@y%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@k%i@y%i@,%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %I@G%i@o%i@d%i@ %i@l%i@i%i@v%i@e%i@s…Lit: %i@s%i@t%i@a%i@n%i@d%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@a%i@t%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@s%i@t%i@a%i@n%i@c%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@t%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@n%i@t%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@n%i@e%i@i%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@l%i@i%i@f%i@t%i@ %i@u%i@p%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@e%i@y%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@n. The use of the word %i@n%i@e%i@i%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ and saying %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@e%i@y%i@e%i@s%i@ instead of %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@e%i@y%i@e%i@s is a figure of speech that gives this a poetic ring.%fn~
%u@[%u@k%u@]%i@w%i@i%i@t%i@h%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@s%i@l%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@p%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@c%i@l%i@e%i@a%i@n…Lit: %i@h%i@a%i@v%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@j%i@u%i@s%i@t%i@i%i@f%i@i%i@e%i@d%i@%fn~
%u@[%u@l%u@]%i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@s%i@e%i@e%i@,%i@ %I@G%i@o%i@d%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@a%i@c%i@t%i@s%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@t%i@h%i@ %i@l%i@i%i@k%i@e%i@ %i@k%i@i%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@s%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@s%i@e…Lit: %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@s%i@e%i@e%i@,%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@u%i@c%i@h%i@ %i@a%i@r%i@e%i@ %I@G%i@o%i@d%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@k%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@d%i@o%i@m%i@%fn~
%u@[%u@m%u@]%i@v%i@i%i@g%i@i%i@l%i@a%i@n%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@k%i@e%i@e%i@p…Lit: %i@w%i@a%i@t%i@c%i@h%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@c%i@a%i@r%i@e%i@f%i@u%i@l%i@l%i@y%i@;%i@ %i@g%i@u%i@a%i@r%i@d%i@e%i@d%i@;%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@o%i@t%i@e%i@c%i@t%i@e%i@d%fn~
%u@[%u@n%u@]%i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@p%i@i%i@r%i@i%i@t%i@u%i@a%i@l%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@r%i@l%i@d%i@,%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@m%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@s%i@c%i@i%i@p%i@l%i@e…Lit: %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@n%i@s%i@,%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@m%i@e%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@l%i@l%i@o%i@w%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@%fn~
%u@[%u@o%u@]%i@m%i@a%i@r%i@v%i@e%i@l%i@o%i@u%i@s%i@ %i@g%i@o%i@d%i@s%i@e%i@n%i@d…Lit: %I@S%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %I@D%i@a%i@v%i@i%i@d. Ref. Matt. 12:23.%fn~
%u@[%u@p%u@]%I@W%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@c%i@a%i@n%i@ %I@I%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@r%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@?…Lit: %I@W%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@n%i@t%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@r%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@?%fn~
%u@[%u@q%u@]%i@c%i@o%i@m%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@r%i@e%i@s%i@c%i@u%i@e…Lit: %i@s%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@d%fn~
%fn~
%u@[%U@A%u@]%i@t%i@o%i@d%i@d%i@l%i@e%i@r%i@s…Lit: %i@b%i@a%i@b%i@i%i@e%i@s. When Luke states in v. 16 that he %i@c%i@a%i@l%i@l%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@m%i@ %i@o%i@v%i@e%i@r, the antecedent of %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@m%i@ is the word %i@b%i@a%i@b%i@i%i@e%i@s%i@ in v. 15, and this word %i@b%i@a%i@b%i@i%i@e%i@s%i@ normally refers to newborns, but it’s inferred that Luke is referring to toddlers and not newborns, since babies are too young to respond to a person beckoning them to come. However, since the word %i@b%i@a%i@b%i@i%i@e%i@s%i@ is used, by our classification of minors from birth to adulthood, this would mean very young children (toddlers) rather than just children generically, since the word children has connotations of a minor from the age of, let’s say, four to twelve. The word used in v. 16 for %i@b%i@o%i@y%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@g%i@i%i@r%i@l%i@s (%i@p%i@a%i@i%i@d%i@i%i@a, παιδίον/Strong’s 3813) has a broader meaning than %i@b%i@a%i@b%i@i%i@e%i@s%i@.%i@%fn~
%u@[%U@B%u@]%I@D%i@o%i@n%i@’%i@t%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@e%i@v%i@e%i@n%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@r%i@ %i@o%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@w%i@i%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@n%i@d%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@o%i@y%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@g%i@i%i@r%i@l%i@s%i@ %i@f%i@r%i@o%i@m%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@m%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@m%i@e…Lit: %I@L%i@e%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@o%i@y%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@g%i@i%i@r%i@l%i@s%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@m%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@n%i@’%i@t%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@e%i@v%i@e%i@n%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@r%i@ %i@o%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@w%i@i%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@n%i@d%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@m…The literal wording of the GT breaks apart what could or should otherwise be combined into a single phrase into two phrases joined by the conjunction %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@.%i@ This is a figure of speech, and since the literal wording is awkward, it’s been modified into a single phrase.%fn~
%u@[%U@C%u@]%I@W%i@h%i@y%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@c%i@a%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@ %i@‘%i@g%i@o%i@o%i@d%i@’%i@?…Ref. notes of Matt. 19:17, Mark 10:18.%fn~
%u@[%U@D%u@]%I@T%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@f%i@a%i@c%i@t%i@ %i@i%i@s%i@,%i@ %i@i%i@t%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@e%i@a%i@s%i@i%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@r%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@c%i@a%i@m%i@e%i@l%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@c%i@r%i@o%i@u%i@c%i@h%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@w%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@c%i@r%i@a%i@w%i@l%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@r%i@o%i@u%i@g%i@h%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@s%i@m%i@a%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@g%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@o%i@r%i@t%i@a%i@l%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@n%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@r%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@r%i@i%i@c%i@h%i@ %i@m%i@a%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@g%i@e%i@t%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@v%i@o%i@l%i@v%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@t%i@h%i@ %I@H%i@i%i@m…Lit: %I@F%i@o%i@r%i@ %i@i%i@t%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@e%i@a%i@s%i@i%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@r%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@c%i@a%i@m%i@e%i@l%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@g%i@o%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@t%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@r%i@o%i@u%i@g%i@h%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@ %i@e%i@y%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@n%i@e%i@e%i@d%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@r%i@i%i@c%i@h%i@ %i@m%i@a%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@e%i@n%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@t%i@o%i@ %I@G%i@o%i@d%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@k%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@d%i@o%i@m. Ref. note of Matt. 19:24. Luke says %i@g%i@o%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@t%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@r%i@o%i@u%i@g%i@h%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@ %i@e%i@y%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@n%i@e%i@e%i@d%i@l%i@e, whereas Matthew says %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@g%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@r%i@o%i@w%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@e%i@y%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@n%i@e%i@e%i@d%i@l%i@e%i@ (and they use different words for %i@e%i@y%i@e%i@ and %i@n%i@e%i@e%i@d%i@l%i@e).%fn~
%u@[%U@E%u@]%I@G%i@e%i@n%i@t%i@i%i@l%i@e%i@s…Also: %i@f%i@o%i@r%i@e%i@i%i@g%i@n%i@e%i@r%i@s%i@;%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@n%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n%i@s. Jesus is pointing out that his crucifixion is even more odious since it’s performed by Gentiles. The Gentiles are unclean; Jews were not supposed to associate with them; there are promises to Israel in the Old Testament of protection from the Gentiles. %fn~
%i@%sb~
Luke Chapter 19%hb~
          %u@1He entered Jericho and proceeded to pass through %i@i%i@t. %u@2There he was, a man named Zacchaeus. He was %i@e%i@m%i@p%i@l%i@o%i@y%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@s%i@ a chief tax collector and was rich. %u@3He had been trying to see Jesus, %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@s%i@e%i@e who he is, and from the crowd wasn’t able to because he was quite short. %u@4He ran out ahead in front %i@o%i@f %i@w%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@c%i@r%i@o%i@w%i@d%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@a%i@d%i@e%i@d and climbed a sycamore tree so that he could see him, since that %i@o%i@h%i@-%i@s%i@o%i@-%i@f%i@a%i@m%i@o%i@u%i@s%i@ fellow was about to pass through. %u@5As he came to that %i@v%i@e%i@r%i@y%i@ spot, Jesus looked up and said to him, %r@“%R@Z%r@a%r@c%r@c%r@h%r@a%r@e%r@u%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@q%r@u%r@i%r@c%r@k%r@—%r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@f%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@d%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@.%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@” %u@6He got down in a hurry and greeted him joyfully. %u@7Seeing that everyone was grumbling and complaining, saying that he arrived with a man who’s a sinner to wreak havoc, %u@8Zacchaeus stood up straight and said to the Lord, “Hey, sir: I’m going to give half of what I own to the poor, and anyone I’ve happened to have cheated, I’ll pay back four times the amount.” %u@9Jesus said to him, %r@“%R@T%r@o%r@d%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@m%r@i%r@l%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@p%r@p%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@,%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%R@U%r@@%R@A%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@c%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@A%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@h%r@a%r@m%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@b%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@f%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%R@I%r@@%R@A%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@b%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@’%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@v%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@w%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%R@I%r@@%R@G%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@k%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@s%r@t%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@1%u@1While still listening, he added an analogy to what he said, on account of him being near Jerusalem and of them thinking that he was going to bring God’s plan for mankind (God’s kingdom) into view imminently. %u@1%u@2So then he said, %r@“%R@A%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@i%r@c%r@u%r@l%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@r%r@-%r@a%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@q%r@u%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@u%r@r%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@c%r@k%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@w%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@f%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@y%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@w%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@m%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@$%r@1%r@0%r@,%r@0%r@0%r@0%r@ %r@b%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%R@U%r@@%R@B%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@I%r@n%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@y%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@s%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@v%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@.%r@’%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@”%R@N%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@r%r@f%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@g%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@p%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@e%r@w%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@t%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@;%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@c%r@k%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@s%r@p%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@           %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%r@”%r@’%R@L%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@H%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@e%r@m%r@i%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@r%r@u%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@l%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@’%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@2%u@8After saying these things, he proceeded to forge on ahead to Jerusalem. %u@2%u@9As it turned out, as he got close to Bethphage and Bethany to the hill named the Mount of Olives, he dispatched two of the disciples, %u@3%u@0telling them, %r@“%R@G%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@h%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@r%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@.%r@ %R@U%r@p%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@l%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@,%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@t%r@.%r@ %R@U%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@b%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@k%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%R@I%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@k%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@W%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@t%r@y%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@?%r@’%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@L%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@.%r@’%r@” %u@3%u@2The ones who were sent found things the way he told them they’d be: %u@3%u@3While they were untying the colt, the owners said to them, “Why are you untying the colt?” %u@3%u@4They said, “The Lord needs to take possession of it.” %u@3%u@5They led it to Jesus, and they saddled their cloaks upon the colt and helped Jesus mount it. %u@3%u@6On the way, people%u@[%u@h%u@] started spreading their cloaks out on the road underneath him.%vn~
          %u@3%u@7By the time they’d made their way to the downward slope of the Mount of Olives, the entire multitude of disciples began rejoicing, that is, praising God in a loud voice about everything that was going on—the miracles they had seen— %u@3%u@8saying%vn~
%si~
He’s favored!%vp~
He’s coming!%vp~
The king!%vp~
At Jehovah’s behest%u@[%U@C%u@]%vp~
Peace in heaven%vp~
And glory to the max%vp~
%si~
%u@3%u@9From the crowd some of the Pharisees said to him, “Teacher, tell your disciples to cut it out.” %u@4%u@0He replied, %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@o%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@m%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@o%r@c%r@k%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@.%r@”%nn~
          %u@4%u@1As he drew near, seeing the city, he wept for it, %u@4%u@2saying, %r@“%R@I%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@e%r@w%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@w%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@g%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@—%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@f%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@%%R@I%r@@%R@G%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@—%r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@d%r@d%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@R%r@e%r@g%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@e%r@m%r@i%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@e%r@r%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@g%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@l%r@a%r@t%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@k%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@—%r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@d%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@—%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@c%r@k%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@p%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@f%r@r%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@e%r@c%r@k%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@p%r@p%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@.%r@” %u@4%u@5He proceeded to enter the temple and cast out the merchandisers, %u@4%u@6telling them, “%R@I%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@’%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@a%r@y%r@e%r@r%r@’%r@;%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@‘%r@r%r@o%r@b%r@b%r@e%r@r%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@’%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@4%u@7Day by day he was teaching in the temple. The chief priests and the designated teachers%u@[%u@m%u@]—the leading men—kept on looking for a way to annihilate him, %u@4%u@8but they were having trouble finding how they could pull it off; the fact of the matter was that all the folk-people kept on listening to him, hanging on to every word he spoke.%vn~

%u@[%u@a%u@]%I@I%i@ %i@j%i@u%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@s%i@t%i@a%i@y%i@ %i@a%i@t%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@r%i@ %i@h%i@o%i@u%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@d%i@a%i@y%i@,%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@s%i@e%i@e…Lit: %I@F%i@o%i@r %I@I%i@ %i@m%i@u%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@s%i@t%i@a%i@y%i@ %i@a%i@t%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@r%i@ %i@h%i@o%i@u%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@d%i@a%i@y. %u@[%u@h%u@]%i@p%i@e%i@o%i@p%i@l%i@e…Lit: %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@y%fn~

%u@[%u@j%u@]%i@w%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@m%i@a%i@k%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@r%i@ %i@p%i@e%i@a%i@c%i@e…Lit: %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@s%i@s%i@o%i@c%i@i%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@t%i@h%i@ %i@p%i@e%i@a%i@c%i@e%fn~
%u@[%u@k%u@]%i@l%i@a%i@y%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@o%i@u%i@t%i@ %i@f%i@l%i@a%i@t…Lit: %i@d%i@a%i@s%i@h%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@g%i@r%i@o%i@u%i@n%i@d. Figuratively speaking, somewhat.%fn~
%u@[%u@l%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@i%i@m%i@e%i@f%i@r%i@a%i@m%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@g%i@e%i@t%i@ %i@c%i@h%i@e%i@c%i@k%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@s%i@e%i@e%i@ %i@i%i@f%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@’%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@’%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@u%i@p%i@p%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@d%i@o…Lit: %i@s%i@e%i@a%i@s%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@r%i@ %i@v%i@i%i@s%i@i%i@t%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n%fn~
%u@[%u@m%u@]%i@d%i@e%i@s%i@i%i@g%i@n%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@e%i@a%i@c%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@s…Lit: %I@S%i@c%i@r%i@i%i@b%i@e%i@s%fn~
%fn~
%u@[%U@A%u@]%i@s%i@e%i@t%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@g%i@o%i@o%i@d%i@ %i@o%i@r%i@d%i@e%i@r%i@,%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@e%i@s%i@e%i@r%i@v%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@y%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@y%i@’%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@u%i@p%i@p%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@b%i@e…Lit: %i@s%i@a%i@l%i@v%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n. This meaning of the word %i@s%i@a%i@l%i@v%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n%i@ builds on its usage in the OT (for example, Isa. 12:2; Jer. 3:23; Hab. 3:13), which has added to it additional meanings in the NT.%fn~
%u@[%U@B%u@]%i@$%i@1%i@0%i@,%i@0%i@0%i@0%i@ %i@b%i@i%i@l%i@l…Lit: %i@t%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@m%i@i%i@n%i@a%i@s. Some liberties taken. A minas is a Middle-Eastern weight measurement amounting to 1.25 lbs. (0.57 kg) per minas, and for Jewish usage, 1 minas is equal to 100 denarii. A denarius is a day’s labor, or $100 (ref note of Matt. 18:28) in today’s purchasing power. However, since such this is pre-industrial era, the actual affect in ancient times of such purchasing power would make the amount seem greater. In other words, the amount would be similarly regarded as $10,000 would be regarded in a very poor country nowadays.%fn~
%u@[%U@C%u@]%i@h%i@e%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@f%i@a%i@v%i@o%i@r%i@e%i@d%i@!%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@m%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@!%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@k%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@!%i@ %i@a%i@t%i@ %I@J%i@e%i@h%i@o%i@v%i@a%i@h%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@h%i@e%i@s%i@t…Lit: %I@T%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@b%i@l%i@e%i@s%i@s%i@e%i@d%i@,%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@m%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@e%i@,%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@k%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@,%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@n%i@a%i@m%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@L%i@o%i@r%i@d. Liberties taken, as this chant, originally chanted in Aramaic, was translated tersely into Gk. As Gk. is compact due to its uses of inflections, representing nuances in verb tenses, noun cases, etc., it’s impossible to render this word-for-word in English while retaining the succinctness that a chant requires. A chant is as much about rhythm as it is about the actual words. I surmise that since this was a chant, and since chants aren’t necessarily written in the same logical fashion as narratives are, this is one of the causes (though not the only one) for the disagreement in the principal manuscripts as to the precise wording of this verse.%fn~
%i@%sb~
Luke Chapter 20%hb~
          %u@1On one of those days, while he happened to be teaching and proclaiming good news%u@[%u@a%u@] to the folk-people in the temple, the chief priests and designated teachers%u@[%u@b%u@] together with the %i@h%i@e%i@a%i@d%i@-%i@c%i@o%i@u%i@n%i@c%i@i%i@l%i@’%i@s councilmen approached him, trying to intimidate him, %u@2saying, “By what authority do you do these things? In other words, who was it who gave you this authority?—Tell us.” %u@3He replied to them, %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@s%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@g%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@:%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@J%r@o%r@h%r@n%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@p%r@t%r@i%r@s%r@m%r@…%r@d%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@i%r@g%r@i%r@n%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@-%r@m%r@a%r@d%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@?%r@” %u@5They reasoned together amongst themselves, saying, ‘If we were to say, “from heaven,” he’ll say, “why didn’t you believe in him?” %u@6But if we were to say “man-made,” all the folk will stone us to death; the fact is, they’re convinced that John is a prophet.’ %u@7They answered that they didn’t know where %i@i%i@t%i@ %i@c%i@a%i@m%i@e from. %u@8Jesus said to them, %r@“%R@N%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@9Now he began telling the folk this analogy: %r@“%R@A%r@ %r@c%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@v%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@y%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%R@U%r@@%R@A%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@r%r@m%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@j%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@n%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@s%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@r%r@m%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@p%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@g%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@y%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@i%r@e%r@l%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@ %R@B%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@r%r@m%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@e%r@m%r@p%r@t%r@y%r@-%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%R@I%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@d%r@d%r@i%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@t%r@r%r@a%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@f%r@f%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@.%r@ %R@B%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@.%r@ %R@D%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@o%r@n%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@w%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@e%r@m%r@p%r@t%r@y%r@-%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@I%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@d%r@d%r@i%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@t%r@r%r@a%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@r%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@u%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@d%r@l%r@y%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@r%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@y%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@W%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@b%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@?%r@—%R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %R@B%r@e%r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@ %R@S%r@o%r@n%r@.%r@ %R@S%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@s%r@p%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@g%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@.%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@S%r@e%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@r%r@m%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@t%r@u%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@T%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@i%r@r%r@:%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@f%r@a%r@u%r@l%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@u%r@s%r@,%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@e%r@w%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@y%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@ %R@W%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@y%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@?%r@—%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@H%r@e%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@p%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@r%r@m%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ forbid!%u@[%u@f%u@]” %u@1%u@7He looked at them and said, %r@“%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@
