%u@[%u@p%u@]%i@a%i@d%i@m%i@i%i@r%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@(%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@a%i@i%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@d%i@e%i@r%i@i%i@v%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@f%i@r%i@o%i@m%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@e%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@i%i@d%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@j%i@o%i@y%i@)…Lit: %i@g%i@l%i@o%i@r%i@y%fn~
%u@[%u@q%u@]%i@b%i@e%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@s%i@p%i@o%i@n%i@s%i@o%i@r%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@b%i@y%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %I@F%i@a%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %I@H%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@u%i@t%i@h%i@o%i@r%i@i%i@t%i@y%i@…%i@b%i@y%i@ %i@v%i@i%i@r%i@t%i@u%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@w%i@n%i@ %i@r%i@e%i@p%i@u%i@t%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n%i@,%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@v%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@ %i@s%i@p%i@o%i@n%i@s%i@o%i@r%i@s%i@h%i@i%i@p%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@s%i@p%i@e%i@a%i@k%i@ %i@o%i@f…Lit: %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@n%i@a%i@m%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %I@F%i@a%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@…%i@i%i@n%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@w%i@n%i@ %i@n%i@a%i@m%i@e%fn~
%fn~
%u@[%U@A%u@]Verse 4 is one of several spurious verses added to the NT well-after the NT was written. Besides missing from best manuscripts of John’s Gospel, it has the familiar characteristics of the spurious embellishments…attempting to protect God’s majesty; more condemnation; odd-sounding miracles. Translated here for reference:%fn~
%I@F%i@o%i@r%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@g%i@e%i@l%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@L%i@o%i@r%i@d%i@ %i@f%i@r%i@o%i@m%i@ %i@t%i@i%i@m%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@i%i@m%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@e%i@n%i@t%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@w%i@n%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@t%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@o%i@o%i@l%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@g%i@i%i@t%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@.%i@ %I@S%i@o%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@w%i@,%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@f%i@i%i@r%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@g%i@e%i@t%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@f%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@g%i@i%i@t%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@c%i@o%i@m%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@s%i@e%i@a%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@v%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@r%i@ %i@s%i@o%i@m%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@i%i@m%i@e.%fn~
%u@[%U@B%u@]%i@w%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@g%i@i%i@t%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@d…For centuries, people have been taking dips in pools, saunas, baths, springs, etc. for therapy, to heal them of whatever ails them. This is the case here. The question here is how the water got agitated (stirred up). Attendants may have stirred it for a few minutes from time to time, or perhaps some of the water was discharged from a feeding aqueduct and as a side-effect of the pool being refilled, the rushing water caused the agitation. %fn~
%i@%sb~
John Chapter 6%hb~
          %u@1After these %i@e%i@v%i@e%i@n%i@t%i@s, Jesus departed for the other side of the Sea of Galilee (%i@o%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@w%i@i%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@k%i@n%i@o%i@w%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@s Tiberias). %u@2A large crowd followed him, because they were seeing miracle after miracle%u@[%u@a%u@] that he did for%u@[%u@b%u@] those feeble with a sickness of one sort or another. %u@3Jesus hiked up a large hill and proceeded to sit down there with his disciples. %u@4Now the Passover wasn’t too far off, the Jewish religious holiday festival. %u@5So Jesus, after lifting up his eyes and seeing that a large crowd was approaching, engaged Philip, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@?%r@”%r@ %u@6Now he was saying this to test him; the fact is, he knew what he was about to do. %u@7Philip replied, “$20,000%u@[%u@c%u@] worth of bread wouldn’t suffice for each person to get %i@e%i@v%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@j%i@u%i@s%i@t a bit.” %u@8One of the disciples, Andrew Simon Peter’s brother, jumped in and said, %u@9“There’s a lad here who has five loaves of barley-bread and two grilled%u@[%u@d%u@] fishes. Apart from these, what’s %i@a%i@v%i@a%i@i%i@l%i@a%i@b%i@l%i@e%i@ for such %i@a%i@ %i@c%i@r%i@o%i@w%i@d%i@ as this?” %u@1%u@0Jesus, adding to this, said, %r@“%R@G%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@o%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@o%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@l%r@a%r@x%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@.%r@”%vn~
      Now there was a lot of grass in the area, so around five-thousand grown men—%i@n%i@o%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@n%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@m%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@c%i@h%i@i%i@l%i@d%i@r%i@e%i@n—found a place to sit. %u@1%u@1Thereupon, Jesus took the break, offered thanks, and distributed it to those seated, and the same with the fish, as much as they kept wanting. %u@1%u@2As they were filled, he further said to his disciples, %r@“%R@G%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@f%r@t%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@c%r@r%r@a%r@p%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@1%u@3So they gathered and filled twelve baskets of scraps from what was leftover by those who had eaten, leftovers from out of the five loaves of the barley-bread.%u@[%U@A%u@] %u@1%u@4The people, upon seeing the miracle%u@[%u@f%u@] that he did, began saying, “This fellow really is the Prophet who comes to the world.” %u@1%u@5So Jesus, knowing that they intended to come and seize him and carry him off to make him king, withdrew alone into the large hill.%vn~
          %u@1%u@6As it had gotten late, his disciples went down to the lake, %u@1%u@7boarded a boat, and began %i@m%i@a%i@k%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@i%i@r%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@y to the other side of the lake, to Capernaum. Darkness had already fallen, and Jesus hadn’t joined them yet; %u@1%u@8furthermore, strong gusts of wind began to stir over the lake. %u@1%u@9Having reached the point where they had rowed around 3 or 3.5 miles (4.5 or 5.5 km)%u@[%u@g%u@], they saw Jesus walking about on top of the lake, and he was getting near the boat. They became frightened. %u@2%u@0He engages with them, %r@“%R@I%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@r%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@.%r@” %u@2%u@1Then they kept on wanting to take him into the boat, but in no time%u@[%U@B%u@] the boat landed on the shore that they were destined for.%vn~
          %u@2%u@2The next day, the crowd which stood on the other side of the lake observed that %i@a%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@i%i@m%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@y%i@ %i@d%i@e%i@p%i@a%i@r%i@t%i@e%i@d%i@ there weren’t any other boats there except for the one, and since Jesus hadn’t joined his disciples in the boat, the disciples had departed alone instead. %u@2%u@3That aside, other small boats from Tiberias arrived near the place where the Lord gave thanks and they ate the bread, %u@2%u@4so when the crowd saw that Jesus wasn’t there nor were his disciples, they boarded %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@s%i@e boats and went to Capernaum looking for Jesus.%vn~
          %u@2%u@5When they found him on the other side of the lake, they said to him, “Teacher, when did you get here?” %u@2%u@6Jesus replied, %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@-%r@t%r@o%r@-%r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@:%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@i%r@c%r@i%r@p%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@u%r@l%r@l%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@D%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@k%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@p%r@i%r@r%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@n%r@-%r@p%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@p%r@i%r@r%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@e%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@.%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@—%R@G%r@o%r@d%r@—%r@d%r@e%r@c%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@u%r@a%r@r%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@w%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@p%r@p%r@r%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %R@H%r@i%r@m%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@8So they said, “How shall we go about doing the things of God?”%vn~
          %u@2%u@9Jesus replied, %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@:%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@ %R@H%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@3%u@0So they said, “So now, what %i@m%i@i%i@r%i@a%i@c%i@u%i@l%i@o%i@u%i@s sign%u@[%U@C%u@] do you perform, in order that we would see %i@i%i@t%i@ and believe in you? What can you do? %u@3%u@1Our ancestors ate %i@b%i@r%i@e%i@a%i@d%i@ %i@c%i@a%i@l%i@l%i@e%i@d manna %i@w%i@h%i@i%i@l%i@e in the wilderness, just as it’s recorded in Scripture, ‘He gave them bread from the sky—from heaven—to eat’.”%vn~
          %u@3%u@2Jesus said, %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@-%r@t%r@o%r@-%r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@:%r@ %R@M%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@;%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@T%r@r%r@u%r@e%r@ %R@B%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@u%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@r%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@3%u@4So they said, “Sir, give us this bread from now on.”%vn~
          %u@3%u@5Jesus said, %r@“%R@I%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@B%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@L%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@.%r@ %R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@u%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@r%r@—%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@—%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@T%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@p%r@p%r@o%r@r%r@t%r@u%r@n%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@.%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@E%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@s%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@f%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@j%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@r%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@           %u@4%u@1Then the Judeans started arguing about him, because he said, %r@“%R@I%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@B%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@.%r@” %u@4%u@2They were stuck on, “Isn’t this %i@j%i@u%i@s%i@t%i@ Jesus, Joseph’s son? Don’t we know %i@a%i@b%i@o%i@u%i@t%i@ the father and the mother?%u@[%U@E%u@] How can he just now say, ‘I have come down out of heaven’?” %u@4%u@3Jesus responded, %r@“%R@N%r@o%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@           %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%r@”%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@           %u@5%u@2So the Judeans proceeded to squabble with one another, “How can this guy give us his flesh to eat?” %u@5%u@3Jesus said, %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@h%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@e.%vn~
          %u@6%u@0So then, many of his disciples who listened said, “This is a tough concept. Who can listen to it %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@a%i@k%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@i%i@t?” %u@6%u@1Jesus, aware within himself that his disciples were grumbling about this, told them, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@W%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@f%r@f%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@c%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@o%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@?%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%R@U%r@@%R@F%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@S%r@p%r@i%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@;%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@h%r@—%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@-%r@e%r@f%r@f%r@o%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@—%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@l%r@p%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@.%r@ %R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@m%r@a%r@r%r@k%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@o%r@k%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@i%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@i%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@u%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@n%r@a%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@n%r@a%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@T%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@w%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%R@I%r@@%R@I%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@’%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@y%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@g%r@.%r@” You see, Jesus knew from the outset that some of them wouldn’t believe, and %i@k%i@n%i@e%i@w%i@ who it is who would betray him. %u@6%u@5He continued, %r@“%R@B%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@o%r@k%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@c%r@e%r@p%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@6%u@6As a result, many of his disciples left to head back %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@y%i@ %i@c%i@a%i@m%i@e%i@ %i@f%i@r%i@o%i@m%i@ %i@o%i@r%i@i%i@g%i@i%i@n%i@a%i@l%i@l%i@y and weren’t travelling about with him anymore. %u@6%u@7Jesus then said to the Twelve, %r@“%R@D%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@?%r@” %u@6%u@8Simon Peter answered him, “Lord, what things%u@[%u@o%u@] shall we leave you for and go to? You have messages of that special fullness of life, eternal life; %u@6%u@9and we—we have believed and have come to recognize that you are the Holy One of God.” %u@7%u@0Jesus replied to them, %r@“%R@H%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@l%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@T%r@w%r@e%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@c%r@k%r@-%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@b%r@b%r@e%r@r%r@?%r@” %u@7%u@1He was side-railed in talking about Judas Son of Simon Iscariot. Indeed, this guy—one of the Twelve—was intending to betray him, thinking it over and over.%vn~
%sf~
%u@[%u@a%u@]%i@m%i@i%i@r%i@a%i@c%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@f%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@m%i@i%i@r%i@a%i@c%i@l%i@e…Lit: %i@s%i@i%i@g%i@n%i@s. The verb tense for %i@w%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@e%i@e%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ changes the rendering somewhat.%fn~
%u@[%u@b%u@]%i@f%i@o%i@r…Lit: %i@u%i@p%i@o%i@n%fn~
%u@[%u@c%u@]%i@$%i@2%i@0%i@,%i@0%i@0%i@0…Lit: %i@2%i@0%i@0%i@ %i@d%i@e%i@n%i@a%i@r%i@i%i@i. For conversions to dollars, ref. note of Matt. 18:28.%fn~
%u@[%u@d%u@]%i@g%i@r%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@e%i@d…Lit: %i@c%i@o%i@o%i@k%i@e%i@d%fn~
%u@[%u@e%u@]%i@f%i@i%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@s%i@p%i@o%i@t%i@,%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@s%i@e%i@a%i@t%i@,%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@r%i@e%i@l%i@a%i@x…Lit: %i@r%i@e%i@c%i@l%i@i%i@n%i@e. Ref. note of Matt. 14:19.%fn~
%u@[%u@f%u@]%i@m%i@i%i@r%i@a%i@c%i@l%i@e…Lit: %i@s%i@i%i@g%i@n%fn~
%u@[%u@g%u@]%i@3%i@ %i@o%i@r%i@ %i@3%i@.%i@5%i@ %i@m%i@i%i@l%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@(%i@4%i@.%i@5%i@ %i@o%i@r%i@ %i@5%i@.%i@5%i@ %i@k%i@m%i@)…Lit: %i@2%i@5%i@ %i@o%i@r%i@ %i@3%i@0%i@ %i@s%i@t%i@a%i@d%i@i%i@i. 1 stadia = 184 meters. See also Luke 24:13.%fn~
%u@[%u@h%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@M%i@a%i@n…Lit: %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@S%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %I@M%i@a%i@n. Ref. note of Matt. 8:20.%fn~
%u@[%u@i%u@]%i@d%i@e%i@c%i@r%i@e%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@g%i@u%i@a%i@r%i@a%i@n%i@t%i@e%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@p%i@e%i@r%i@s%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@i%i@s%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@m%i@a%i@n%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@ %i@i%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@p%i@p%i@r%i@o%i@v%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@b%i@y%i@ %I@H%i@i%i@m…Lit: %i@s%i@e%i@a%i@l%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ [%i@m%i@a%i@n]. Also, see the way John used the word %i@s%i@e%i@a%i@l%i@e%i@d%i@ in Rev. chapters 6, 7.%fn~
%u@[%u@j%u@]%i@r%i@e%i@e%i@l%i@s%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m%i@ %i@i%i@n…Lit: %i@d%i@r%i@a%i@g%i@s%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m%fn~
%u@[%u@k%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@a%i@c%i@k%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@l%i@f%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@O%i@l%i@d%i@ %I@T%i@e%i@s%i@t%i@a%i@m%i@e%i@n%i@t…Lit: %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@o%i@p%i@h%i@e%i@t%i@s%fn~
%u@[%u@l%u@]%i@r%i@e%i@c%i@e%i@i%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@s%i@t%i@r%i@u%i@c%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n…Also: %i@b%i@e %i@t%i@a%i@u%i@g%i@h%i@t%fn~
%u@[%u@m%u@]%i@m%i@y%i@ %i@t%i@r%i@u%i@e%i@ %i@f%i@l%i@e%i@s%i@h%i@ %i@i%i@s%i@ %i@t%i@r%i@u%i@e%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@o%i@d%i@,%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@t%i@r%i@u%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@l%i@o%i@o%i@d%i@ %i@i%i@s%i@ %i@d%i@r%i@i%i@n%i@k…Or perhaps:%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@f%i@l%i@e%i@s%i@h%i@ %i@i%i@s%i@ %i@t%i@r%i@u%i@e%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@o%i@d%i@,%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@b%i@l%i@o%i@o%i@d%i@ %i@i%i@s%i@ %i@t%i@r%i@u%i@e%i@ %i@d%i@r%i@i%i@n%i@k.%fn~
%u@[%u@n%u@]%i@s%i@t%i@i%i@c%i@k%i@s%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@m%i@e…Or: %i@d%i@w%i@e%i@l%i@l%i@s%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@m%i@e%fn~
%u@[%u@o%u@]%i@w%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@s…Or:%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@m. The text is ambiguous.%i@%fn~
%fn~
%u@[%U@A%u@]%I@S%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@y%i@ %i@g%i@a%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@f%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@w%i@e%i@l%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@a%i@s%i@k%i@e%i@t%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@s%i@c%i@r%i@a%i@p%i@s%i@ %i@f%i@r%i@o%i@m%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@l%i@e%i@f%i@t%i@o%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@b%i@y%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@d%i@ %i@e%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@n%i@,%i@ %i@l%i@e%i@f%i@t%i@o%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@s%i@ %i@f%i@r%i@o%i@m%i@ %i@o%i@u%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@f%i@i%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@l%i@o%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@a%i@r%i@l%i@e%i@y%i@-%i@b%i@r%i@e%i@a%i@d…Lit: %I@S%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@y%i@ %i@g%i@a%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@f%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@w%i@e%i@l%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@a%i@s%i@k%i@e%i@t%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@s%i@c%i@r%i@a%i@p%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@u%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@f%i@i%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@l%i@o%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@a%i@r%i@l%i@e%i@y%i@ [%i@b%i@r%i@e%i@a%i@d]%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@y%i@ %i@l%i@e%i@f%i@t%i@o%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@b%i@y%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@d%i@ %i@e%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@n. The way John penned this sentence in its literal form is not lock-tight from a logical perspective, even given the leeway which Gk. allows in reordering sequences of words. In other words, what John should’ve written is this: %I@S%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@y%i@ %i@g%i@a%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@f%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@w%i@e%i@l%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@a%i@s%i@k%i@e%i@t%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@s%i@c%i@r%i@a%i@p%i@s%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@w%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@l%i@e%i@f%i@t%i@o%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@b%i@y%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@d%i@ %i@e%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@o%i@u%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@f%i@i%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@l%i@o%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@a%i@r%i@l%i@e%i@y%i@ [%i@b%i@r%i@e%i@a%i@d]. The movement of the clause %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@w%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@l%i@e%i@f%i@t%i@o%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@b%i@y%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@d%i@ %i@e%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@n%i@ and the changing of it from active to passive voice (from %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@y%i@ %i@l%i@e%i@f%i@t%i@o%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@ to %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@w%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@l%i@e%i@f%i@t%i@o%i@v%i@e%i@r) would’ve had made what he said more logically coherent. Of course, we understand what he meant.%fn~
%u@[%U@B%u@]%i@i%i@n%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@i%i@m%i@e…Lit: %i@i%i@m%i@m%i@e%i@d%i@i%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@l%i@y. John again (see previous note from v. 13) loosely constructs the logic of a sentence; in its literal rendering, it appears to the reader that once Jesus boarded the boat, the boat miraculously transported itself in a split-second (as insinuated by the word %i@i%i@m%i@m%i@e%i@d%i@i%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@l%i@y)%i@ to the destination shore. I doubt if that was the case—rather, it was near the destination in the first place.%fn~
%u@[%U@C%u@]%i@m%i@i%i@r%i@a%i@c%i@u%i@l%i@o%i@u%i@s%i@ %i@s%i@i%i@g%i@n…The Jews were following the guidelines outlined in the OT for vetting a prophet (Exod. 7:9; Deut.13:1–5). As John has stated in length in earlier parts of his gospel, Jesus did miraculous signs. In fact, the crowd had just chased him down because he’d walked on water. The problem was that that wasn’t good enough—they wanted him to produce a miracle on-demand. This is symptomatic of unbelief, the stubborn refusal to believe.%fn~
%u@[%U@D%u@]%I@I%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@u%i@s%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@t%i@o%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@f%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@l%i@i%i@f%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@b%i@l%i@i%i@s%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@D%i@a%i@y%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %I@R%i@e%i@c%i@k%i@o%i@n%i@i%i@n%i@g…Lit:%i@ %I@I%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@r%i@a%i@i%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m%i@ %i@u%i@p%i@ [%i@r%i@e%i@s%i@u%i@r%i@r%i@e%i@c%i@t%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m]%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@L%i@a%i@s%i@t%i@ %I@D%i@a%i@y. This is connected to what Jesus said in John 5:29. In 6:39 here, %i@r%i@a%i@i%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m%i@ %i@u%i@p in Gk. is equivalent to %i@r%i@e%i@s%i@u%i@r%i@r%i@e%i@c%i@t%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m, and in the NT resurrection refers to %i@l%i@i%i@f%i@e%i@-%i@a%i@f%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@-%i@d%i@e%i@a%i@t%i@h. A phrase like the Last Day is similar to other phrases found in the Bible, such as the %i@l%i@a%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@d%i@a%i@y%i@s [plural] (Isa. 2:2; Mic. 4:1; Acts 2:17; 2 Tim. 3:1; 2 Pet. 3:3); %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@l%i@a%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@h%i@o%i@u%i@r; %i@t%i@h%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@d%i@a%i@y%i@s; %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@d%i@a%i@y; etc. All these phrases in general refer to the time of a fulfillment of a prophecy or a promise of some sort. According to its usage in the NT, we are living in the Last Days. This means we’re living in the fulfillment of the promises in the OT and in the Gospels of the fulfillment of Jesus’s mission to die and to be resurrected and the consequent access to God through faith in him, even for the Gentile; the indwelling of the Holy Spirit in all believers; God working through the church; etc. But the Last Day [singular] refers to the fulfillment of a different promise, that is, what God will do with those who died, in this case with believers who died trusting in Him. For unbelievers, the Last Day is the Day of Judgment.%fn~
%u@[%U@E%u@]%I@D%i@o%i@n%i@’%i@t%i@ %i@w%i@e%i@ %i@k%i@n%i@o%i@w%i@ %i@a%i@b%i@o%i@u%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@f%i@a%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@m%i@o%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@?…The word %i@a%i@b%i@o%i@u%i@t%i@ doesn’t appear in the GT, but the insinuation—which is present when carried over into English via a literal rendering—is a result of the GT saying %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@f%i@a%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@m%i@o%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ rather than %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@f%i@a%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@m%i@o%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r, or something. Furthermore, the Judeans just finished Joseph as Jesus’s father, then a few words later refer to him as %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@f%i@a%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ instead of saying %I@J%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@p%i@h%i@ again. The insinuation is that they have a low opinion about Mary and Joseph. This could be for a few reasons, because Mary and Joseph don’t live in Judea and aren’t part of the political hierarchy. Or because they’re poor, they’re common laborers. Or perhaps Mary’s virgin birth was assumed to be an adulterous relationship. But whatever low opinion they had of Mary and Joseph, it could not have been because of their genealogy.%fn~
%u@[%U@F%u@]%I@W%i@o%i@u%i@l%i@d%i@ %i@i%i@t%i@ %i@m%i@a%i@k%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@y%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@f%i@f%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@n%i@c%i@e%i@ %i@i%i@f%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@w%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@s%i@e%i@e%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@s%i@c%i@e%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@t%i@o%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@f%i@r%i@o%i@m%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@p%i@o%i@t%i@ %I@I%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@j%i@u%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@s%i@t%i@a%i@n%i@d%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@a%i@t%i@?%i@…Lit: %I@S%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@,%i@ %i@i%i@f%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@w%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@s%i@e%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@m%i@a%i@n%i@ %i@g%i@o%i@ %i@u%i@p%i@ %i@f%i@r%i@o%i@m%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@l%i@a%i@c%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@j%i@u%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@a%i@t%i@?…This is a best-guess at what Jesus meant; I’m not exactly sure. %i@%fn~
%i@%sb~
John Chapter 7%hb~
          %u@1After all of this, Jesus was travelling about Galilee; indeed, he hadn’t been wanting to travel throughout Judea, since the Judeans wouldn’t let up in trying to kill him. %u@2The Jewish Festival of Tabernacles was coming up, %u@3so his brothers said to him, “Relocate from here and make your way to Judea, so that your disciples too might behold the %i@m%i@i%i@r%i@a%i@c%i@u%i@l%i@o%i@u%i@s%i@ works that you do. %u@4When you get right down to it, no one does something in seclusion when he’s striving to be a well-known, public figure. If you do these %i@m%i@i%i@r%i@a%i@c%i@u%i@l%i@o%i@u%i@s%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@r%i@k%i@s, reveal yourself to the world.” %u@5The fact is, his brothers hadn’t been believing in him all the while either. %u@6So Jesus, consuming the remark, told them, %r@“%R@M%r@y%r@ %R@T%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@y%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@r%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %R@T%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@y%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@u%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@s%r@—%r@i%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@i%r@l%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@i%r@v%r@a%r@l%r@;%r@ %R@M%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@—%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@i%r@v%r@a%r@l%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@u%r@l%r@f%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@” %u@9Having said these things, he stayed in Galilee.%vn~
          %u@1%u@0As his brothers went down to the festival, then he too went, not openly but secretly instead. %u@1%u@1So then, the Judeans kept searching for him at the festival and kept on repeating, “Where is that guy?” %u@1%u@2There was a huge amount of murmuring and grumbling about him by the crowds; some kept saying that he’s good, but others kept saying, “No—on the contrary—he leads the crowd astray.” %u@1%u@3No one, however, was talking about him in public due to the fear of the Judeans.%vn~
          %u@1%u@4Now already midway through the festival, Jesus went over to the temple and proceeded to teach. %u@1%u@5The Judeans were amazed, “How does this fellow know the Scriptures %i@s%i@o%i@ %i@w%i@e%i@l%i@l, being uneducated?” %u@1%u@6Jesus replied, %r@“%R@M%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@r%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@O%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@I%r@f%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %R@H%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@c%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@i%r@g%r@i%r@n%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@a%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@a%r@k%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@k%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@y%r@;%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@k%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@O%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@r%r@r%r@u%r@p%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@f%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@g%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@p%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@H%r@a%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %R@M%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@u%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@%%R@I%r@@%R@O%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%R@I%r@@%R@T%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %R@L%r@a%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@c%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@b%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@?%r@ %R@W%r@h%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@y%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@?%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@0The crowd answered, “You’re demon-possessed. Who’s trying to kill you?”%vn~
          %u@2%u@1Jesus replied, %r@“%R@I%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@k%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@w%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%R@I%r@@%R@I%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@b%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@y%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%R@I%r@@%R@S%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@b%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@b%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@A%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%R@I%r@@%R@L%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@w%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@f%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %R@M%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@s%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%R@U%r@@%R@A%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@f%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@c%r@i%r@r%r@c%r@u%r@m%r@c%r@i%r@s%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@(%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@i%r@g%r@i%r@n%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@ %r@%%R@I%r@@%R@L%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@w%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@f%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %R@M%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@g%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@w%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@p%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%R@I%r@@%R@M%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@)%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@c%r@i%r@r%r@c%r@u%r@m%r@c%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@S%r@a%r@b%r@b%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@I%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@i%r@r%r@c%r@u%r@m%r@c%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@S%r@a%r@b%r@b%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@p%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@L%r@a%r@w%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@S%r@a%r@b%r@b%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@R%r@e%r@f%r@r%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@c%r@i%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@d%r@g%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@r%r@f%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@;%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@r%r@r%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@d%r@g%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@5Some of those from Jerusalem then proceeded to say, “Isn’t this the guy they’re trying to kill? %u@2%u@6Take a look—he’s speaking aloud in public, and they’re not saying a thing to him. %u@2%u@7That aside—we know what this guy’s all about%u@[%u@d%u@]; but when the Messiah, the Christ, does %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@f%i@a%i@c%i@t%i@ come,%i@ no one’s been able to figure out%u@[%U@C%u@] what his raison d’être will be%u@[%u@d%u@].” %u@2%u@8So while Jesus was teaching in the temple, he cried out, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@.%r@ %R@A%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@O%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@e%r@,%r@ %R@W%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@I%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %R@H%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %R@H%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%R@I%r@@%R@O%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@w%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@” %u@3%u@0So they tried to apprehend him, but no one %i@m%i@a%i@n%i@a%i@g%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@o lay a hand on him, because his time hadn’t come yet. %u@3%u@1But among those in the crowd, many believed in him. They kept saying, “When the Messiah does come, will he perform more miracles%u@[%u@e%u@] than what this fellow’s done?”%vn~
          %u@3%u@2The Pharisees heard that the crowd was chatting about these matters, matters which are related to him, so the High Priests and the Pharisees sent temple police to apprehend him. %u@3%u@3Jesus then said, %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@t%r@t%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@c%r@k%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@O%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@b%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@b%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@.%r@” %u@3%u@5So the Judeans said to themselves, “Where’s this guy planning to go that we won’t %i@b%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@b%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ find him? He’s not intending to go to the Jews scattered %i@t%i@h%i@r%i@o%i@u%i@g%i@h%i@o%i@u%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@R%i@o%i@m%i@a%i@n%i@ %I@E%i@m%i@p%i@i%i@r%i@e and teach the Greek-speaking%i@ %I@J%i@e%i@w%i@s, is he? %u@3%u@6What about this statement, ‘You’ll look for me and won’t %i@b%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@b%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ find me,’ and, ‘Where I’ll be, you can’t go’?”%vn~
          %u@3%u@7On the last day of the festival, Jesus stood and cried out, %r@“%R@I%r@f%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@k%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@O%r@l%r@d%r@ %R@T%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@S%r@t%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@m%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@’%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@3%u@9Now he was talking about the Spirit, he whom they were going to receive, %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@i%i@s, those who believed in him. You see, the Spirit had not yet %i@c%i@o%i@m%i@e, since Jesus had not yet been glorified.%vn~
          %u@4%u@0Then out of the crowd these words %i@a%i@r%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d were spoken, “This person really is the Prophet %i@p%i@r%i@o%i@m%i@i%i@s%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@O%i@l%i@d%i@ %I@T%i@e%i@s%i@t%i@a%i@m%i@e%i@n%i@t.” %u@4%u@1Others were saying, “This person is the Messiah.” But others were saying, “Certainly the Messiah won’t come from Galilee, will he? %u@4%u@2Isn’t there a verse in the Old Testament which says that the Messiah will be a descendant of David and will be from Bethlehem, the town where David was from?” %u@4%u@3So the crowd split into factions over him, %u@4%u@4and some of them kept wanting to apprehend him; instead, no one laid a hand on him.%vn~
          %u@4%u@5The police returned to the High Priests and the Pharisees, who told those guys, “Why didn’t you haul him off?” %u@4%u@6The police replied, “Never before has a man spoken the way this man has.” %u@4%u@7The Pharisees replied, “You haven’t been led astray too, have you? %u@4%u@8Not a single one of the rulers or the Pharisees have believed in him, have they? %u@4%u@9Instead, %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@l%i@y%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@’%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@l%i@i%i@e%i@v%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m%i@ %i@i%i@s this bunch, the ones who don’t understand the Law %i@o%i@f%i@ %I@M%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@s—the accursed.” %u@5%u@0Nicodemus, the one who visited him earlier on and who’s one of them, interjected and said to them, %u@5%u@1”Our code of law, the Law of Moses, doesn’t allow a verdict to be rendered unless the defendant%i@ is first heard from and what he did is known, now does it?” %u@5%u@2They replied, “You’re not a Galilean-sympathizer%u@[%u@f%u@] too, are you? Check into it and—you’ll see—no prophet from Galilee gets brought to prominence%u@[%u@g%u@].” %u@5%u@3%u@[%u@h%u@]%vn~
%sf~
%u@[%u@a%u@]%i@s%i@i%i@n%i@c%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@r%i@r%i@u%i@p%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n…Or: %i@t%i@r%i@u%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@ %i@u%i@n%i@r%i@i%i@g%i@h%i@t%i@e%i@o%i@u%i@s%i@n%i@e%i@s%i@s%fn~
%u@[%u@b%u@]%i@p%i@u%i@t%i@s%i@ %i@i%i@t%i@s%i@ %i@m%i@a%i@n%i@d%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@t%i@o%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@a%i@c%i@t%i@i%i@c%i@e…Lit: %i@d%i@o%i@e%i@s%fn~
%u@[%u@c%u@]%i@m%i@a%i@k%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@r%i@r%i@e%i@c%i@t%i@ %i@j%i@u%i@d%i@g%i@m%i@e%i@nt…Lit: %i@j%i@u%i@d%i@g%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@r%i@i%i@g%i@h%i@t%i@e%i@o%i@u%i@s%i@ %i@j%i@u%i@d%i@g%i@m%i@e%i@n%i@t. A figure of speech.%fn~
%u@[%u@d%u@]%i@w%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@g%i@u%i@y%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@a%i@b%i@o%i@u%i@t…%i@w%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@r%i@a%i@i%i@s%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@d%i@’%i@ê%i@t%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@b%i@e…Lit: %i@w%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@c%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@ %i@i%i@s…%i@w%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@c%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@ %i@i%i@s. Use of %i@w%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@c%i@e is the key part of the well-known expression that these phrases are; ref. note of Luke 13:25.%fn~
%u@[%u@e%u@]%i@m%i@i%i@r%i@a%i@c%i@l%i@e%i@s…Lit: %i@s%i@i%i@g%i@n%i@s%i@%fn~
%u@[%u@f%u@]%I@G%i@a%i@l%i@i%i@l%i@e%i@a%i@n%i@-%i@s%i@y%i@m%i@p%i@a%i@t%i@h%i@i%i@z%i@e%i@r…Lit: %i@o%i@u%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@G%i@a%i@l%i@i%i@l%i@e%i@e. Or perhaps, %i@f%i@r%i@o%i@m%i@ %I@G%i@a%i@l%i@i%i@l%i@e%i@e; the same phrase appeared verbatim in v. 41.%fn~
%u@[%u@g%u@]%i@g%i@e%i@t%i@s%i@ %i@b%i@r%i@o%i@u%i@g%i@h%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@o%i@m%i@i%i@n%i@e%i@n%i@c%i@e…Lit: %i@r%i@a%i@i%i@s%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@u%i@p%fn~
%u@[%u@h%u@]Verse 53 omitted as spurious. See note of John 8:1.%fn~
%fn~
%u@[%U@A%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@L%i@a%i@w%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %I@M%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@s…Lit: %I@M%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@s. The man Moses is a metonymy for the code of Law he wrote, the Torah, the first five books of the Bible.%fn~
%u@[%U@B%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@a%i@t%i@r%i@i%i@a%i@r%i@c%i@h%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@o%i@l%i@d…Lit: %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@f%i@a%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@s. This refers to Abraham and his heirs. Though circumcision was included in the Law of Moses, it has an earlier origin and is therefore subject to the covenant where it was introduced. Paul reiterates this point in Gal. 3:17.%fn~
%u@[%U@C%u@]%i@n%i@o%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@e%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@b%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@f%i@i%i@g%i@u%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@u%i@t…Lit: %i@n%i@o%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@e%i@ %i@k%i@n%i@o%i@w%i@s. John writes the phrase %i@w%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@f%i@r%i@o%i@m%i@ three times in short succession: twice in v. 27 and once in v. 28. The word for %i@k%i@n%i@o%i@w%i@ (%i@g%i@i%i@n%i@ō%i@s%i@k%i@ō, γινώσκω/Strong’s 1097) in this occurrence (%i@h%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@b%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@f%i@i%i@g%i@u%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@u%i@t)%i@ is a different word for %i@k%i@n%i@o%i@w%i@ than what he uses for the other two occurrences (%i@o%i@i%i@d%i@a, οἶδα/Strong’s 1492). Generally speaking, John prefers %i@o%i@i%i@d%i@a%i@ over %i@g%i@i%i@n%i@ō%i@s%i@k%i@ō%i@,%i@ so he’s signaling the employment a meaning which differs from %i@o%i@i%i@d%i@a, and hence %i@g%i@i%i@n%i@ō%i@s%i@k%i@ō%i@ as used here more accurately means %i@t%i@o %i@f%i@i%i@g%i@u%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@u%i@t%i@ rather than %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@k%i@n%i@o%i@w%i@.%i@%fn~
%i@%sb~
John Chapter 8%hb~
          %u@1%u@–%u@1%u@1%u@[%U@A%u@]%u@[%U@B%u@]%vn~
          %u@1%u@2He talked to them again. %r@“%R@I%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@.%r@ %R@T%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@s%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@l%r@k%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@r%r@k%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@;%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@1%u@3The Pharisees then said, “You’re stating claims%u@[%u@a%u@] about yourself; your claims aren’t true.”%vn~
          %u@1%u@4Jesus formulated a reply, %r@“%R@I%r@f%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@l%r@a%r@i%r@m%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@c%r@l%r@a%r@i%r@m%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@a%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@b%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@.%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@           %u@1%u@9So they proceeded to say to him, “Where is your father?”%vn~
      Jesus replied, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@ %R@H%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@” %u@2%u@0He made these remarks while teaching in the temple treasury. No one apprehended him, since his moment hadn’t come yet.%vn~
          %u@2%u@1He spoke to them once more. %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@.%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@(%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@.%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@.%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@,%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@’?” %u@2%u@3He proceeded to tell them, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ Father. %u@2%u@8So then Jesus said, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@t%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@g%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@,%r@           %u@3%u@1Then Jesus proceeded to say to the Judeans who just believed in him, %r@“%R@I%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@i%r@c%r@k%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %R@M%r@y%r@ %R@M%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@c%r@i%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@3%u@3They replied, “We’re descendants of Abraham and haven’t ever been enslaved; how can you say ‘the truth will set you free’?”%vn~
          %u@3%u@4Jesus replied, %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@-%r@t%r@o%r@-%r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %R@A%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@h%r@a%r@m%r@;%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@y%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@3%u@9They retorted, “Our father—our ancestor—is Abraham.”%vn~
      Jesus %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ says, %r@“%R@H%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %R@A%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@h%r@a%r@m%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@f%r@s%r@p%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %R@A%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@h%r@a%r@m%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@B%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@y%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@o%r@k%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@.%r@ %R@A%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@h%r@a%r@m%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
      So they said, “We were not born out of wedlock, the result of two people who just slept together. We have one father: God.”%vn~
          %u@4%u@2Jesus said, %r@“%R@I%r@f%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@r%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@.%r@ %R@N%r@o%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@o%r@k%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@ %R@T%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@m%r@u%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@f%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@p%r@p%r@o%r@r%r@t%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@j%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@ %R@W%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@u%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@t%r@y%r@p%r@i%r@c%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@a%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@p%r@o%r@s%r@i%r@t%r@o%r@r%r@y%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@k%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@a%r@r%r@—%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@P%r@r%r@o%r@p%r@a%r@g%r@a%r@t%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@L%r@i%r@e%r@s%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@I%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@—%r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@a%r@k%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@W%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@p%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@?%r@ %R@I%r@f%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@a%r@k%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@.%r@ %R@H%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@:%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@4%u@8The Judeans took this in and responded, “Didn’t we just nail it when we said you’re a Samaritan and you’re demon-possessed?” %u@4%u@9Jesus replied, %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@-%r@p%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@;%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@t%r@r%r@a%r@r%r@y%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@n%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@o%r@n%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@p%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@y%r@;%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@O%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@k%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@d%r@g%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@-%r@t%r@o%r@-%r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@:%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@s%r@ %R@M%r@y%r@ %R@M%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@f%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@w%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@—%r@n%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@5%u@2The Judeans said, “Now we know for sure that you’re demon-possessed. Abraham died and %i@s%i@o%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@d%i@ the %I@O%i@l%i@d%i@ %I@T%i@e%i@s%i@t%i@a%i@m%i@e%i@n%i@t%i@ prophets, but you say, ‘If someone keeps My Message, there’s no way that he’ll stare at death %i@f%i@r%i@o%i@m%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@w%i@ to the end of time—no way’.” %u@5%u@3You’re not greater than our ancestor, our father Abraham, who was someone who died, %i@a%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u? The prophets %i@a%i@l%i@l%i@ died too. What do you fashion yourself to be?”%vn~
          %u@5%u@4Jesus replied, %r@“%R@I%r@f%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@f%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@,%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@.%r@ %R@M%r@y%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@f%r@y%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@H%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@-%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@H%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@ %R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %R@H%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@-%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@a%r@r%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@;%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %R@H%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %R@H%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@o%r@r%r@ %R@A%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@h%r@a%r@m%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@y%r@ %R@D%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@w%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@j%r@o%r@i%r@c%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@5%u@7The Judeans said back to him, “You’re not %i@e%i@v%i@e%i@n fifty years old yet, and you’ve seen Abraham?”%vn~
          %u@5%u@8Jesus said, %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@-%r@t%r@o%r@-%r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@:%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@f%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %R@A%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@h%r@a%r@m%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@-%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@-%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@-%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@y%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@-%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@p%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@.%r@” %u@5%u@9They then picked up stones to stone him with, but Jesus ducked out of sight%i@ and left the temple.%vn~

%u@[%u@a%u@]%i@ %i@s%i@t%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@c%i@l%i@a%i@i%i@m%i@s…Lit: %i@w%i@i%i@t%i@n%i@e%i@s%i@s%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@%fn~
%u@[%u@b%u@]%i@w%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %I@I%i@’%i@m%i@ %i@a%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@a%i@b%i@o%i@u%i@t%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@a%i@g%i@e%i@n%i@d%i@a%i@ %i@i%i@s…Lit: %i@w%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@c%i@e%i@ %I@I%i@’%i@m%i@ %i@f%i@r%i@o%i@m%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %I@I%i@’%i@m%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@a%i@d%i@e%i@d. The phrase %i@w%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@c%i@e%i@ %I@I%i@’%i@m%i@ %i@f%i@r%i@o%i@m%i@ is an expression, ref. note of Luke 13:25. It’s assumed %i@w%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %I@I%i@’%i@m%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@a%i@d%i@e%i@d%i@ is a similar phrase.%fn~
