%u@[%u@m%u@]%I@Y%i@o%i@u%i@r%i@ %i@r%i@e%i@p%i@u%i@t%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@e%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@y%i@t%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %I@Y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@s%i@t%i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@r…Lit: %I@Y%i@o%i@u%i@r%i@ %i@n%i@a%i@m%i@e%fn~
%u@[%u@n%u@]%I@T%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@O%i@l%i@d%i@ %I@T%i@e%i@s%i@t%i@a%i@m%i@e%i@n%i@t…Lit: %I@T%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@L%i@a%i@w [%i@o%i@f%i@ %I@M%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@s]%fn~
%u@[%u@o%u@]%i@e%i@m%i@b%i@o%i@d%i@i%i@m%i@e%i@n%i@t%i@s…Lit: %i@s%i@o%i@n%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@%fn~
%u@[%u@p%u@]%i@c%i@a%i@p%i@a%i@b%i@i%i@l%i@i%i@t%i@i%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@c%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n%i@s…Lit: %i@a%i@r%i@m%i@%fn~
%u@[%u@q%u@]%i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@a%i@l%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@b%i@y%i@ %I@M%i@e…Lit: %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %I@I%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@a%i@l%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@m%fn~
%u@[%u@r%u@]%I@T%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@f%i@a%i@c%i@t%i@ %i@i%i@s%i@,%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@y%i@ %i@l%i@o%i@v%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@c%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@i%i@s%i@h%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@i%i@d%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@j%i@o%i@y%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@m%i@a%i@n%i@k%i@i%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@r%i@e%i@v%i@e%i@l%i@s%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@m%i@o%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@i%i@d%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@j%i@o%i@y%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@i%i@c%i@h%i@ %I@G%i@o%i@d%i@ %i@r%i@e%i@v%i@e%i@l%i@s%i@ %i@i%i@n…Lit: %I@F%i@o%i@r%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@y%i@ %i@l%i@o%i@v%i@e%i@d [%i@a%i@g%i@a%i@p%i@a%i@ō, ἀγαπάω/Strong’s 25)] %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@g%i@l%i@o%i@r%i@y%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@m%i@o%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@g%i@l%i@o%i@r%i@y%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %I@G%i@o%i@d.%fn~
%u@[%u@s%u@]%i@w%i@h%i@o%i@l%i@e%i@-%i@h%i@e%i@a%i@r%i@t%i@e%i@d%i@l%i@y%i@ %i@e%i@m%i@b%i@r%i@a%i@c%i@e…Lit: %i@r%i@e%i@c%i@e%i@i%i@v%i@e%fn~
%u@[%u@t%u@]%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@f%i@i%i@n%i@a%i@l%i@ %i@d%i@a%i@y%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@i%i@t%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@s%i@a%i@i%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@n%i@e…Lit: %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@l%i@a%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@d%i@a%i@y%fn~
%u@[%u@u%u@]%i@d%i@i%i@r%i@e%i@c%i@t%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@m%i@e…Lit: %i@g%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@m%i@m%i@a%i@n%i@d%i@m%i@e%i@n%i@t. Same wording as John 10:18.%fn~
%fn~
%u@[%U@A%u@]%i@f%i@a%i@i%i@r%i@ %i@c%i@i%i@t%i@i%i@z%i@e%i@n%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@g%i@l%i@o%i@r%i@i%i@o%i@u%i@s%i@ %i@l%i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@o%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@r%i@a%i@i%i@n%i@b%i@o%i@w…Lit: %I@Z%i@i%i@o%i@n%i@-%i@d%i@a%i@u%i@g%i@h%i@t%i@e%i@r. Some liberties taken. The word %i@d%i@a%i@u%i@g%i@h%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@ is a synecdoche of all those who belong to Zion, with the implication that the daughters are those who love it and never want to depart from it. Zion is the ethereal, uncorrupted land that God promises Israel, and not just land but the state of living. It is the fulfillment of His promises; it is the elimination of the shortcomings of what is achievable in this life; it is the existence to come for those who love and follow God.%fn~
%u@[%U@B%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@r%i@l%i@d%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@g%i@o%i@n%i@e%i@ %i@c%i@h%i@a%i@s%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@a%i@f%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@l%i@l%i@o%i@w%i@e%i@r…Or perhaps: %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@r%i@l%i@d%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@l%i@e%i@f%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@s%i@c%i@i%i@p%i@l%i@e%i@s%i@,%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@s%i@u%i@b%i@j%i@e%i@c%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m…Lit: %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@r%i@l%i@d%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@d%i@e%i@p%i@a%i@r%i@t%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m. The expression %i@b%i@e%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m%i@/%i@g%i@o%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m%i@ is used in Matt. 4:19 to mean %i@b%i@e%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@s%i@c%i@i%i@p%i@l%i@e%i@,%i@ and is used in Matt. 16:23 to mean %i@b%i@e%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@s%i@u%i@b%i@j%i@e%i@c%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@.%fn~
%u@[%U@C%u@]%I@G%i@r%i@e%i@e%i@k%i@-%i@s%i@p%i@e%i@a%i@k%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %I@J%i@e%i@w%i@s…Lit: %I@G%i@r%i@e%i@e%i@k%i@s. Assumed that these are the same people as the %i@d%i@i%i@a%i@s%i@p%i@o%i@r%i@a%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@G%i@r%i@e%i@e%i@k%i@s referred to in John 7:35. Some, however, argue that these people are %I@G%i@o%i@d%i@-%i@f%i@e%i@a%i@r%i@e%i@r%i@s%i@ (ref. Acts 13:16):%i@ Gentiles who adhered to Jewish practices buy hadn’t converted to Judaism per-se. Whether Greek-speaking Jews or God-fearers, they are likely one or the other and not Gentiles (the word used here could also be rendered %I@G%i@e%i@n%i@t%i@i%i@l%i@e%i@s), since Jews wouldn’t have any interactions with Gentiles, especially during a festival.%fn~
%u@[%U@D%u@]%i@e%i@n%i@j%i@o%i@y%i@s…Gk: %i@p%i@h%i@i%i@l%i@e%i@ō%i@ (φιλέω/Strong’s 5368). %I@P%i@h%i@i%i@l%i@o%i@s is typically rendered %i@l%i@o%i@v%i@e, but is not to be confused with %i@a%i@g%i@a%i@p%i@ā%i@ (ἀγάπη/Strong’s 26), which is also rendered %i@l%i@o%i@v%i@e. The philos-kind of love is the love of another person, or in this verse of another thing, for the friendship, comradery, and enjoyment that one receives from such association; agapā%i@ is the love of another because one treasures that other person.%fn~
%u@[%U@E%u@]%i@h%i@o%i@n%i@o%i@r%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m%i@,%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@c%i@l%i@u%i@d%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@o%i@v%i@i%i@d%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@f%i@i%i@n%i@a%i@n%i@c%i@i%i@a%i@l%i@ %i@s%i@u%i@p%i@p%i@o%i@r%i@t…Lit: %i@h%i@o%i@n%i@o%i@r%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m. The Gk. word for honor means both to honor as the face-value of the word means and to provide financial support. Ref. Matt. 15:3–6, 1 Tim. 5:17–18.%fn~
%u@[%U@F%u@]%i@h%i@o%i@i%i@s%i@t%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@u%i@p…The Gk. word also means %i@e%i@x%i@a%i@l%i@t%i@e%i@d%i@ and also means %i@k%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@e%i@d. The verse has multiple meanings, based on the Gk. word having multiple meanings. On the one hand, Jesus will be hoisted off the ground by being put on a cross. Another meaning is that he’ll be killed, just as the same Gk. word is used to mean %i@k%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@e%i@d in Acts 7:28. On the other hand, Jesus will be exalted, lifted up as a spectacle for everyone to see, but afterwards exalted above every name (ref. Phil. 2:9).%fn~
%i@%sb~
John Chapter 13%hb~
          %u@1Prior to the Passover festival, Jesus had known that the time had arrived for him to depart this world and cross over %i@b%i@a%i@c%i@k %i@t%i@o the Father. He loved his own who were in the world, this established order of humans—he loved them until the very end. %u@2The devil had already lodged himself in the heart of Judas %i@s%i@o%i@n of Simon Iscariot so that he would facilitate his arrest, %i@w%i@h%i@i%i@l%i@e a dinner was taking place; %u@3%I@J%i@e%i@s%i@u%i@s%i@ knew that the Father had placed all matters under his control%u@[%u@a%u@] and%i@ knew%i@ that he %i@h%i@a%i@d%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@e%i@v%i@i%i@o%i@u%i@s%i@l%i@y%i@ departed from God and %i@n%i@o%i@w%i@ is%i@ heading %i@b%i@a%i@c%i@k to God. %u@4Getting up from the dinner %i@t%i@a%i@b%i@l%i@e%i@,%i@ he %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ takes off his outer garments, took a towel and wrapped it around himself. %u@5He %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n puts some water in a wash basin and begins to wash the disciples’ feet and wipe them dry with the towel which was wrapped around him. %u@6So he comes to Simon Peter. He %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ says to him,%vn~
      “Lord, you’re going to wash my feet, %i@n%i@o%i@w %i@a%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u?”%vn~
          %u@7Jesus’s response was, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@g%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@8Peter %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ says, “Don’t you ever wash my feet—ever.”%vn~
      Jesus answered, %r@“%R@I%r@f%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@g%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@-%r@c%r@i%r@r%r@c%r@l%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@b%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
       %u@9Simon Peter %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ tells him, “Lord, don’t just %i@d%i@o my feet but %i@d%i@o the hands and head too.”%vn~
          %u@1%u@0Jesus %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ says, %r@“%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@e%r@l%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@c%r@e%r@p%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@e%r@t%r@;%r@ %r@a%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@l%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@ %R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@l%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%R@U%r@@%R@A%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@…%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@y%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@,%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@.%r@” %u@1%u@1You see, he knew the one who was facilitating his arrest; this is the reason he said that not all of you all are clean.%vn~
          %u@1%u@2When he’d finished washing their feet, he put his outer garments back on, sat back down %i@a%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@a%i@b%i@l%i@e%u@[%u@c%u@], and told them, %r@“%R@D%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@d%r@d%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@‘%R@T%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@’%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@‘%R@L%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@,%r@’%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@a%r@k%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@p%r@e%r@r%r@l%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@ %r@%%R@I%r@@%R@T%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%R@I%r@@%R@L%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@e%r@t%r@—%r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %R@L%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@T%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@—%r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@h%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@e%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@“%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@s%r@h%r@i%r@p%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@t%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%R@U%r@@%R@B%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@%vp~

          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%r@”%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@f%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%R@I%r@@%R@O%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@-%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@-%r@%%R@I%r@@%R@O%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@y%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@-%r@%%R@I%r@@%R@O%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@.%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@-%r@t%r@o%r@-%r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@:%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@(%r@i%r@.%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@l%r@e%r@-%r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@e%r@m%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@s%r@)%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@O%r@n%r@e%r@ %R@W%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@2%u@1Having said these things, Jesus was troubled in spirit and went on record%u@[%u@f%u@] to say, “I’m telling you the honest-to-goodness truth, I really am: one of you is going to betray me and facilitate my arrest.” %u@2%u@2The disciples began looking at one another perplexed at what he was talking about. %u@2%u@3One of his disciples, whom Jesus loved and loved, was seated next to him, and since he was a close companion was in physical contact with him, leaning against him%u@[%U@C%u@]. %u@2%u@4So Simon Peter nods at this fellow to ask whom he might be talking about. %u@2%u@5That fellow leaned in closer to Jesus, putting his head right next to Jesus’s head%u@[%U@C%u@], and %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ says to him, “Lord, who is it?” %u@2%u@6Jesus replied, %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@y%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@f%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@p%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@)%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@p%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@m%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@l%r@i%r@c%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@g%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@v%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@u%r@y%r@.%r@” So he dipped the slice, takes it, and gives it to Judas %i@s%i@o%i@n%i@ of Simon Iscariot. %u@2%u@7Right after giving it to him, Satan entered into%u@[%U@D%u@] that guy. Jesus %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ says to him, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@,%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@—%r@q%r@u%r@i%r@c%r@k%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@8Now no one who was seated %i@a%i@r%i@o%i@u%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@a%i@b%i@l%i@e knew to what %i@e%i@n%i@d%i@ he told him this. %u@2%u@9Truth be known, some of them surmised, “Since Judas is in charge of the purse, Jesus is telling him to go buy what we’re missing for the festival or that he should donate something to the needy.” %u@3%u@0So that guy received the slice of bread and departed poste-haste; and it was night.%vn~
          %u@3%u@1So when he had departed, Jesus %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ says, %r@“%R@A%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@f%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@f%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@f%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@f%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@r%r@a%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@a%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@F%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@a%r@s%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@j%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@t%r@t%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@J%r@u%r@d%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@’%r@;%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@b%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@u%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@-%r@n%r@e%r@w%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@k%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%R@U%r@@%R@E%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@;%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@T%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@o%r@g%r@n%r@i%r@z%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@c%r@i%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@3%u@6Simon Peter %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ says to him, “Lord, where are you headed?”%vn~
      Jesus replied, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@3%u@7Peter %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ says, “Lord, why can’t I follow you now? I’d put my life on the line%u@[%u@l%u@] for you.”%vn~
          %u@3%u@8Jesus %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ replies, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@?%r@—%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@-%r@t%r@o%r@-%r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@:%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@s%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@r%r@o%r@o%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
%sf~
%u@[%u@a%u@]%i@p%i@l%i@a%i@c%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@m%i@a%i@t%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@s%i@ %i@u%i@n%i@d%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@n%i@t%i@r%i@o%i@l…Lit: %i@g%i@i%i@v%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@s%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@t%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@n%i@d%i@s%fn~
%u@[%u@b%u@]%i@c%i@a%i@n%i@’%i@t%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@p%i@a%i@r%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@n%i@e%i@r%i@-%i@c%i@i%i@r%i@c%i@l%i@e…Lit: %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@n%i@’%i@t%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@p%i@o%i@r%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@t%i@h%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@%fn~
%u@[%u@c%u@]%i@s%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@b%i@a%i@c%i@k%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@w%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@a%i@b%i@l%i@e…Lit: %i@r%i@e%i@c%i@l%i@i%i@n%i@e%i@d%fn~
%u@[%u@d%u@]%i@e%i@m%i@i%i@s%i@s%i@a%i@r%i@y…Lit: %i@a%i@p%i@o%i@s%i@t%i@l%i@e%fn~
%u@[%u@e%u@]%I@I%i@ %i@a%i@m%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@O%i@n%i@e%i@-%i@a%i@n%i@d%i@-%I@O%i@n%i@l%i@y%i@-%I@O%i@n%i@e%i@…Lit:%i@ %I@I%i@ %i@a%i@m…Ref. note of Mark 13:6%fn~
%u@[%u@f%u@]%i@w%i@e%i@n%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@ %i@r%i@e%i@c%i@o%i@r%i@d…Lit: %i@t%i@e%i@s%i@t%i@i%i@f%i@i%i@e%i@d%fn~
%u@[%u@g%u@]%i@a%i@ %i@s%i@m%i@a%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@s%i@l%i@i%i@c%i@e…Lit: %i@a%i@ %i@m%i@o%i@r%i@s%i@e%i@l; %i@a%i@ %i@h%i@u%i@n%i@k%fn~
%u@[%u@h%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@M%i@a%i@n…Lit: %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@S%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %I@M%i@a%i@n. Ref. note of Matt 8:20.%fn~
%u@[%u@i%u@]Some of the early manuscripts here insert the phrase, %I@I%i@f%i@ %I@G%i@o%i@d%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@g%i@l%i@o%i@r%i@i%i@f%i@i%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m, but the better manuscripts do not, so it has been omitted.%fn~
%u@[%u@j%u@]%i@f%i@e%i@l%i@l%i@a%i@s…Or: %i@b%i@o%i@y%i@s. Lit: %i@c%i@h%i@i%i@l%i@d%i@r%i@e%i@n. Similar to usage in John 21:5.%fn~
%u@[%u@k%u@]%i@d%i@i%i@r%i@e%i@c%i@t%i@i%i@v%i@e…Also: %i@c%i@o%i@m%i@m%i@a%i@n%i@d%i@m%i@e%i@n%i@t. Ref. usage in John 10:18.%fn~
%u@[%u@l%u@]%i@p%i@u%i@t%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@l%i@i%i@f%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@l%i@i%i@n%i@e…Or: %i@l%i@a%i@y%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@l%i@i%i@f%i@e%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@w%i@n. Same phrase used in John 10:11,17.%fn~
%fn~
%u@[%U@A%u@]%i@c%i@l%i@e%i@a%i@n…The word %i@c%i@l%i@e%i@a%i@n%i@ here has two meanings. First, the obvious meaning, the one based on the context: physically clean from a bath with water. Second, the word %i@c%i@l%i@e%i@a%i@n%i@ here means %i@p%i@u%i@r%i@e%i@ or %i@h%i@o%i@l%i@y%i@.%i@%fn~
%u@[%U@B%u@]%I@H%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@n%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@t%i@h%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@f%i@e%i@l%i@l%i@o%i@w%i@s%i@h%i@i%i@p%i@ %i@s%i@e%i@t%i@t%i@i%i@n%i@g …Lit: %i@h%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@ %i@m%i@u%i@n%i@c%i@h%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@b%i@r%i@e%i@a%i@d. The eating of bread here symbolizes the bond of fellowship and unity between those who partake of it together. This makes the Judas’s betrayal all the more wicked.%fn~
%u@[%U@C%u@]%I@O%i@n%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@s%i@c%i@i%i@p%i@l%i@e%i@s%i@,%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@m%i@ %I@J%i@e%i@s%i@u%i@s%i@ %i@l%i@o%i@v%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@l%i@o%i@v%i@e%i@d%i@,%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@s%i@e%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@n%i@e%i@x%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m%i@,%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@s%i@i%i@n%i@c%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@c%i@l%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@m%i@p%i@a%i@n%i@i%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@p%i@h%i@y%i@s%i@i%i@c%i@a%i@l%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@n%i@t%i@a%i@c%i@t%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@t%i@h%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m%i@,%i@ %i@l%i@e%i@a%i@n%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@a%i@g%i@a%i@i%i@n%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@m…Lit: %I@H%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@r%i@e%i@c%i@l%i@i%i@n%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@,%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@s%i@c%i@i%i@p%i@l%i@e%i@s%i@,%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %I@J%i@e%i@s%i@u%i@s%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@b%i@o%i@s%i@o%i@m%i@,%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@m%i@ %I@J%i@e%i@s%i@u%i@s%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@l%i@o%i@v%i@i%i@n%i@g. Liberties taken here; also in vv. 12, 25. The disciples were reclined, not sitting (ref. note of Luke 16:22). It’s likely that John was propped up on his arm (hand on side of head, elbow on the couch); in v. 25 the Gk. text literally says that he %i@f%i@e%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@b%i@a%i@c%i@k%i@ [%i@l%i@e%i@a%i@n%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@b%i@a%i@c%i@k] %i@a%i@t%i@ %I@J%i@e%i@s%i@u%i@s%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@b%i@o%i@s%i@o%i@m. One can deduce that he took away his arm-prop, laid down completely, and leaned back. This change in position caused his head to be in contact with Jesus’s bosom, specifically his stomach and chest. He leaned back so that his head would be in close proximity to Jesus’s head, so that he could speak a few words with him that no one else could hear.%fn~
%u@[%U@D%u@]%I@S%i@a%i@t%i@a%i@n%i@ %i@e%i@n%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@t%i@o…Though speculation, it may be that Jesus placed the morsel of bread directly into Judas’s mouth, similar to how a bride and a groom put wedding cake into each other’s mouth—a similar type of symbolism. It may be that John is implying that, just as the bread was physically placed into Judas’s mouth and entered his body, on a parallel level Satan entered Judas’s heart.%fn~
%u@[%U@E%u@]%I@I%i@’%i@m%i@ %i@g%i@i%i@v%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@b%i@r%i@a%i@n%i@d%i@-%i@n%i@e%i@w%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@r%i@e%i@c%i@t%i@i%i@v%i@e%i@,%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@u%i@l%i@d%i@ %i@l%i@o%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@o%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r…Lit: %I@I%i@’%i@m%i@ %i@g%i@i%i@v%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@b%i@r%i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@n%i@e%i@w%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@m%i@m%i@a%i@n%i@d%i@m%i@e%i@n%i@t%i@,%i@ %i@s%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@u%i@l%i@d%i@ %i@l%i@o%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@o%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r. The wording is a figure of speech: instead of stating the commandment, the end-result of the commandment is stated instead; the commandment is insinuated.%fn~
%i@%sb~
John Chapter 14%hb~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@”%R@D%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@:%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@O%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@e%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@b%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@.%r@ %R@N%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@s%r@e%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@v%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@           %u@5Thomas %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ says to him, “Lord, we don’t know where you’re headed; how can we know the way?” %u@6Jesus %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ says, %r@“%R@I%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@           %u@2%u@2Judas (not Iscariot) %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ says to him, “Lord, how has it turned out that you intend to manifest yourself to us and not to the world?” %u@2%u@3Jesus thought it over and said, %r@“%R@I%r@f%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@y%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@m%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@y%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@.%r@ %R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@y%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@i%r@g%r@i%r@n%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@”%R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@o%r@k%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %R@P%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@;%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@v%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@o%r@k%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@f%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@I%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@l%r@k%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@r%r@;%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@R%r@u%r@l%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@W%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@(%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@S%r@y%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@m%r@ %R@W%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %R@D%r@o%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@H%r@u%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %R@R%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %R@S%r@y%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@m%r@)%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@—%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@m%r@p%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@m%r@i%r@d%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@k%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%R@A%r@n%r@y%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@%%R@I%r@@%R@I%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@w%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%R@I%r@@%R@I%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@’%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@m%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@g%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@g%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@a%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@s%r@.%r@%vn~
      %r@“%R@G%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@,%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
%sf~
%u@[%u@a%u@]%i@h%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@f%i@a%i@i%i@t%i@h…Also: %i@b%i@e%i@l%i@i%i@e%i@v%i@e; %i@t%i@r%i@u%i@s%i@t%fn~
%u@[%u@b%u@]%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %I@F%i@a%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@e%i@s%i@t%i@a%i@t%i@e…Also: %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %I@F%i@a%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@h%i@o%i@u%i@s%i@e%fn~
%u@[%u@c%u@]%i@c%i@o%i@l%i@l%i@e%i@c%i@t%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@k%i@e%i@e%i@p%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@b%i@y%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@s%i@i%i@d%i@e…Lit: %i@r%i@e%i@c%i@e%i@i%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@s%i@e%i@l%i@f%fn~
%u@[%u@d%u@]%i@d%i@o%i@e%i@s%i@ %I@H%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@s%i@t%i@u%i@f%i@f…Lit: %i@d%i@o%i@e%i@s%i@ %I@H%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@r%i@k%i@s%fn~
%u@[%u@e%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@p%i@e%i@r%i@s%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@a%i@m%i@e%i@—%i@b%i@e%i@t%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@e%i@v%i@e%i@n…Lit: %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t [%i@p%i@e%i@r%i@s%i@o%i@n] %i@w%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@g%i@r%i@e%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@.%i@%fn~
%u@[%u@f%u@]%i@a%i@c%i@t%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@d%i@e%i@l%i@e%i@g%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@u%i@t%i@h%i@o%i@r%i@i%i@t%i@y…%i@u%i@p%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@a%i@u%i@t%i@h%i@o%i@r%i@i%i@z%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n…Lit: %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@n%i@a%i@m%i@e%fn~
%u@[%u@g%u@]%i@b%i@y%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@a%i@n%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@f…Or: %i@i%i@n%i@%fn~
%u@[%u@h%u@]%I@I%i@f%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@’%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@e%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@ %i@l%i@o%i@v%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@m%i@e…Lit: %i@i%i@f%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@w%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@l%i@o%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@m%i@e. The subjunctive verb form is of someone who’s faced with a choice of doing something or not doing it.%fn~
%u@[%u@i%u@]%I@I%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@t%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@v%i@e…Lit: %I@I%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@t [Gk. %i@o%i@u%i@ (οὐ/Strong’s 3756 )]. The Gk. word %i@o%i@u%i@ is unexpected, whereas the word %i@m%i@a%i@ is expected here, skewing the meaning.%fn~
%u@[%u@j%u@]%i@d%i@o%i@n%i@’%i@t%i@ %i@l%i@e%i@t%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@r%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@a%i@r%i@t%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@r%i@o%i@u%i@b%i@l%i@e%i@d…The same exact wording as used in v. 1.%fn~
%u@[%u@k%u@]%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@c%i@a%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@c%i@c%i@u%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@t%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@,%i@ %i@t%i@e%i@m%i@p%i@t%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@t%i@h%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@t%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@,%i@ %i@o%i@r%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@t%i@i%i@m%i@i%i@d%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@y%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@y…Lit: %i@h%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@t%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@m%i@e%fn~
%fn~
%u@[%U@A%u@]%I@A%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@i%i@f%i@ %I@I%i@ %i@m%i@a%i@n%i@a%i@g%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@e%i@p%i@a%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@p%i@l%i@a%i@c%i@e%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@r%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@—%i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %I@I%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@l%i@l…Lit: %I@I%i@f%i@ %I@I%i@ %i@w%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@e%i@p%i@a%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@p%i@l%i@a%i@c%i@e%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@r%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u. The tentativeness of the subjunctive verb tense used in the GT is a figure of speech. But what is actually meant is arduousness. In order for Jesus to prepare a place, he must first endure the cross, and only then afterwards, being resurrected and ascending to the Father, can he prepare a place. He having to go to the cross is not tentative but arduous; hence the figure of speech. %fn~
%u@[%U@B%u@]%I@L%i@e%i@t%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@ %i@r%i@e%i@p%i@e%i@a%i@t%i@—%I@I%i@f%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@w%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@a%i@s%i@k%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@ %i@s%i@o%i@m%i@e%i@t%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@i%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@c%i@t%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@d%i@e%i@l%i@e%i@g%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@u%i@t%i@h%i@o%i@r%i@i%i@t%i@y%i@,%i@ %I@I%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@ %i@i%i@t…Lit: %I@I%i@f%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@w%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@a%i@s%i@k%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@o%i@m%i@e%i@t%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@n%i@a%i@m%i@e%i@,%i@ %I@I%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@d%i@o. Obvious to the reader of the GT, v. 14 is a repetition of v. 13a. The difference between the wording in these two verses is that v. 13 is a more compact repetition, omitting a few words with the confidence that the reader will understand that they were omitted for brevity. Therefore, the repetition of the statement is a figure of speech, one where Jesus wants to be clear about what he’s saying and to emphasize it.%fn~
%u@[%U@C%u@]%I@I%i@’%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@a%i@s%i@k%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@F%i@a%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@g%i@i%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@l%i@p%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@f%i@f%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@n%i@t%i@ %i@k%i@i%i@n%i@d…Lit: %I@I%i@’%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@a%i@s%i@k%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@F%i@a%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r [%i@t%i@o%i@ %i@g%i@i%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@o%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@l%i@p%i@e%i@r] %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %I@H%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@g%i@i%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@o%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@l%i@p%i@e%i@r. The Gk. text omits the phrase %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@g%i@i%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@o%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@l%i@p%i@e%i@r, with the wording shortened to %I@I%i@’%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@a%i@s%i@k%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@F%i@a%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %I@H%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@i%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@g%i@i%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@o%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@h%i@e%i@l%i@p%i@e%i@r%i@.%i@ This short form is a figure of speech.%fn~
%i@%sb~
John Chapter 15%hb~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@”%R@I%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@T%r@r%r@u%r@e%r@ %r@%%R@I%r@@%R@G%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@p%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %R@V%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@m%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@a%r@n%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@t%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@d%r@u%r@c%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%R@U%r@@%R@A%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@a%r@p%r@e%r@s%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %R@H%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@u%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@b%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@h%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@d%r@u%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@b%r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@d%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@T%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@           %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%r@”%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@H%r@e%r@l%r@p%r@e%r@r%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@S%r@p%r@i%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@T%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@c%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@t%r@h%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@p%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@p%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@s%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@o%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@c%r@l%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@w%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@l%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@c%r@l%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@-%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~

%u@[%u@a%u@]%i@g%i@r%i@a%i@p%i@e%i@s…Lit: %i@f%i@r%i@u%i@i%i@t%fn~
%u@[%u@b%u@]%i@s%i@y%i@s%i@t%i@e%i@m%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@o%i@u%i@g%i@h%i@t…Lit: %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@r%i@d. Same thing spoken in John 14:23,24.%fn~
%u@[%u@c%u@]%i@s%i@t%i@a%i@y%i@ %i@a%i@t%i@t%i@a%i@c%i@h%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@o…Lit: %i@r%i@e%i@m%i@a%i@i%i@n or %i@d%i@w%i@e%i@l%i@l%i@%fn~
%u@[%u@d%u@]%i@y%i@o%i@u%i@’%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@r%i@a%i@n%i@c%i@h…Lit: %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@a%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@a%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@r%i@a%i@n%i@c%i@h%i@e%i@s. The gospel writers frequently use plurals forms when we in English would render the equivalent using the singular.%fn~
%u@[%u@e%u@]%i@m%i@a%i@k%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@r%i@e%i@q%i@u%i@e%i@s%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@c%i@e…This interpolation reflects the verb tense of the word%i@ %i@a%i@s%i@k%i@ in this verse.%fn~
%u@[%u@f%u@]%I@M%i@y%i@ %I@F%i@a%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@g%i@l%i@o%i@r%i@i%i@f%i@i%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@s%i@e%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@i%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@n%i@t%i@i%i@n%i@u%i@o%i@u%i@s%i@l%i@y%i@ %i@y%i@i%i@e%i@l%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@l%i@o%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@f%i@r%i@u%i@i%i@t%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@u%i@l%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@c%i@h%i@i%i@e%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@t%i@a%i@t%i@u%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@s%i@c%i@i%i@p%i@l%i@e%i@s…Lit: %I@I%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %I@F%i@a%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@g%i@l%i@o%i@r%i@i%i@f%i@i%i@e%i@d%i@,%i@ %i@s%i@o%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@u%i@l%i@d%i@ [%i@o%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@o%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@a%i@g%i@a%i@i%i@n] %i@b%i@e%i@a%i@r%i@ %i@m%i@u%i@c%i@h%i@ %i@f%i@r%i@u%i@i%i@t%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d [%i@i%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@ %i@s%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@l%i@e%i@a%i@p] %i@b%i@e%i@c%i@o%i@m%i@e%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@s%i@c%i@i%i@p%i@l%i@e%i@s.%fn~
%u@[%u@g%u@]%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@h%i@o%i@l%i@e…the Gk. verb tense for the word %i@k%i@e%i@e%i@p%i@ insinuates keeping the commandments viewed in its entirety.%fn~
%u@[%u@h%u@]%i@p%i@u%i@t%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@l%i@i%i@f%i@e%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@l%i@i%i@n%i@e…Or: %i@l%i@a%i@y%i@ %i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@l%i@i%i@f%i@e%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@w%i@n. Ref. note of John 10:11.%fn~
%u@[%u@i%u@]%i@s%i@e%i@t%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@u%i@p…Or: %i@p%i@o%i@s%i@i%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n%i@e%i@d%i@%fn~
%u@[%u@j%u@]%i@w%i@h%i@i%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@c%i@t%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@d%i@e%i@l%i@e%i@g%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@u%i@t%i@h%i@o%i@r%i@i%i@t%i@y…Lit: %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@n%i@a%i@m%i@e%fn~
%u@[%u@k%u@]%i@a%i@ %i@p%i@a%i@r%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@f…Lit: %i@o%i@u%i@t%i@ %i@o%i@f%fn~
%u@[%u@l%u@]%i@r%i@e%i@p%i@u%i@t%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@u%i@t%i@h%i@o%i@r%i@i%i@t%i@y%i@ %I@I%i@’%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@d%i@e%i@l%i@e%i@g%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u…Lit: %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@n%i@a%i@m%i@e%fn~
%u@[%u@m%u@]%i@b%i@e%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@s%i@i%i@n…Lit: %i@h%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@s%i@i%i@n%fn~
%u@[%u@n%u@]%i@s%i@a%i@c%i@r%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@b%i@o%i@o%i@k…Lit: %I@L%i@a%i@w [%i@o%i@f%i@ %I@M%i@o%i@s%i@e%i@s]%fn~
%u@[%u@o%u@]%I@H%i@e%i@l%i@p%i@e%i@r…Also: %I@A%i@d%i@v%i@o%i@c%i@a%i@t%i@e, %I@C%i@o%i@m%i@f%i@o%i@r%i@t%i@e%i@r, %I@I%i@n%i@t%i@e%i@r%i@c%i@e%i@s%i@s%i@o%i@r. Same word used in John 14:16. The Gk. word refers to someone who, nowadays, fills the role of an attorney.%fn~
%u@[%u@p%u@]%i@p%i@r%i@o%i@c%i@e%i@e%i@d%i@s%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@r%i@t%i@h…Lit%i@:%i@ %i@g%i@o%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@o%i@u%i@t%fn~
%fn~
%u@[%U@A%u@]%I@H%i@e%i@ %i@r%i@e%i@m%i@o%i@v%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@b%i@r%i@a%i@n%i@c%i@h%i@e%i@s%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@a%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@t%i@t%i@a%i@c%i@h%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@n%i@’%i@t%i@ %i@p%i@r%i@o%i@d%i@u%i@c%i@e…The meaning of this remark should be understood in light of what Jesus said in Matt. 3:10, 7:19, and also later in John 15:6; in other words, branches that don’t produce fruit are unbelievers: those who are presented with Jesus’s message but refuse to believe. It is not the believer who makes mistake after mistake.%fn~
%u@[%U@B%u@]%i@d%i@i%i@s%i@c%i@a%i@r%i@d%i@e%i@d…Lit: %i@t%i@h%i@r%i@o%i@w%i@n%i@ %i@o%i@u%i@t%i@s%i@i%i@d%i@e. This expression (the keyword in the expression being %i@o%i@u%i@t%i@s%i@i%i@d%i@e) appears in Matt. 5:13, 13:48, 21:39; Mark 4:11, 12:8; Luke 14:35, 20:15; John 6:37, 9:34 (and perhaps more) and has the consistent meaning of %i@c%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@g%i@o%i@r%i@i%i@c%i@a%i@l%i@l%i@y%i@ %i@r%i@e%i@j%i@e%i@c%i@t%i@e%i@d%i@ in all these occurrences.%fn~
%u@[%U@C%u@]%I@I%i@f%i@ %I@I%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@d%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@t%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@n%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@m%i@i%i@r%i@a%i@c%i@u%i@l%i@o%i@u%i@s%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@r%i@k%i@s%i@ %i@a%i@m%i@o%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@m%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@ %i@o%i@n%i@e%i@ %i@e%i@l%i@s%i@e%i@ %i@e%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@d%i@i%i@d%i@,%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@y%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@u%i@l%i@d%i@n%i@’%i@t%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@s%i@i%i@n…This is consistent with what’s found in Mark 3:29, namely blaspheming the Holy Spirit. The rejection of an irrefutable display of God’s miraculous power is a deep sin.%fn~
%i@%sb~
John Chapter 16%hb~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@”%R@I%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@o%r@k%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@r%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@u%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@c%r@o%r@m%r@m%r@u%r@n%r@i%r@c%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@.%r@ %R@N%r@o%r@—%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@b%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@—%r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@u%r@l%r@t%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@v%r@o%r@r%r@,%r@           %u@1%u@7So various disciples of his said to one another, “What’s this he’s telling us, ’In a bit you’ll no longer be able to look at me, and a bit after that you’ll see me,’ and, that %r@‘%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@’?” %u@1%u@8They kept on saying, “What’s this ‘in a bit’?—We don’t know what he’s talking about.” %u@1%u@9Jesus understood that they were wanting to ask him %i@a%i@b%i@o%i@u%i@t%i@ %i@i%i@t, and he said, %r@“%R@I%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@c%r@l%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@i%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@s%r@h%r@i%r@p%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@l%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@f%r@r%r@i%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@u%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@s%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@i%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@2%u@9His disciples %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ say, “Hey, you’re speaking plainly now, not explaining things by way of analogy. %u@3%u@0At this time we know that you know everything, and there’s no need%u@[%u@h%u@] for anyone to ask you %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@a%i@n%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@o%i@f%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@y%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@a%i@l%i@o%i@g%i@y. This is the reason we believe that you came from God.” %u@3%u@1Jesus replied, %r@“%R@N%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@L%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@f%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@c%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@r%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@r%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@e%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@t%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@i%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@n%r@%%r@i%r@@%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@.%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@.%r@ %R@B%r@u%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@I%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@o%r@k%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@u%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@i%r@b%r@u%r@l%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%R@U%r@@%R@A%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@:%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@f%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
%sf~
%u@[%u@a%u@]%i@w%i@i%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@u%i@p%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@w%i@r%i@o%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@g…Lit: %i@d%i@o%i@ %i@w%i@r%i@o%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@b%i@y%i@ %i@m%i@e; %i@f%i@a%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@a%i@p%i@a%i@r%i@t; %i@s%i@i%i@n; %i@s%i@t%i@u%i@m%i@b%i@l%i@e. Ref. note of Matt. 11:6.%fn~
%u@[%u@b%u@]%i@n%i@o%i@—%i@e%i@v%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@w%i@o%i@r%i@s%i@e…Lit: %i@n%i@e%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@m%i@i%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t [%i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@n%i@s%i@i%i@d%i@e%i@r%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@s]; %i@p%i@u%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@a%i@s%i@i%i@d%i@e [%i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@a%i@k%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@s%i@ %i@i%i@n]; %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@t%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@g. A figure of speech of a sort, to forget about the previous remark because the next one is so much more severe.%fn~
%u@[%u@c%u@]%i@i%i@f%i@ %I@I%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@f%i@a%i@c%i@t%i@ %i@d%i@e%i@p%i@a%i@r%i@t…Lit%i@:%i@ %i@i%i@f%i@ %I@I%i@ %i@w%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@ %i@t%i@o%i@ %i@d%i@e%i@p%i@a%i@r%i@t%fn~
%u@[%u@d%u@]%i@a%i@c%i@t%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@r%i@i%i@g%i@h%i@t%i@ %i@w%i@a%i@y%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@d%i@o%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %i@r%i@i%i@g%i@h%i@t%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@s…Also: %i@r%i@i%i@g%i@h%i@t%i@e%i@o%i@u%i@s%i@n%i@e%i@s%i@s%fn~

%u@[%u@f%u@]%i@w%i@h%i@e%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@d%i@a%i@y%i@ %i@a%i@r%i@r%i@i%i@v%i@e%i@s…Lit: %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@a%i@t%i@ %i@d%i@a%i@y%fn~
%u@[%u@g%u@]%i@w%i@h%i@i%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@c%i@t%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@d%i@e%i@l%i@e%i@g%i@a%i@t%i@e%i@d%i@ %i@a%i@u%i@t%i@h%i@o%i@r%i@i%i@t%i@y…Lit: %i@i%i@n%i@ %i@m%i@y%i@ %i@n%i@a%i@m%i@e%i@%fn~
%u@[%u@h%u@]%i@t%i@h%i@e%i@r%i@e%i@’%i@s%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@ %i@n%i@e%i@e%i@d…Lit: %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@ %i@n%i@e%i@e%i@d%i@.%i@ The %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ is used like %i@o%i@n%i@e, like %i@o%i@n%i@e%i@ %i@h%i@a%i@s%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@ %i@n%i@e%i@e%i@d%i@.%i@%fn~

%u@[%U@A%u@]%i@b%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@r%i@a%i@v%i@e%i@ %i@n%i@o%i@w…Lit: %i@c%i@o%i@u%i@r%i@a%i@g%i@e. A short remark; same one rendered %i@b%i@r%i@a%i@c%i@e%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@r%i@s%i@e%i@l%i@f%i@ in Mark 10:49. This same remark used to be used in English but has dropped out of usage. In %I@S%i@n%i@o%i@w%i@ %I@W%i@h%i@i%i@t%i@e%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@t%i@h%i@e%i@ %I@S%i@e%i@v%i@e%i@n%i@ %I@D%i@w%i@a%i@r%i@f%i@s%i@,%i@ Doc tells the other dwarfs, %I@C%i@o%i@u%i@r%i@a%i@g%i@e%i@,%i@ %i@m%i@e%i@n%i@,%i@ %i@c%i@o%i@u%i@r%i@a%i@g%i@e%i@!%i@,%i@ before they scrub themselves with soap and water.%fn~
%i@%sb~
John Chapter 17%hb~
          %u@1Jesus said these things then lifted his eyes up to the sky, to where heaven is, and said, %r@“%R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@r%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@ %R@G%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@f%r@y%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@f%r@y%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@m%r@a%r@g%r@i%r@n%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@[%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@a%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@]%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@c%r@i%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@u%r@l%r@l%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@e%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@E%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@:%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@O%r@n%r@l%r@y%r@ %R@T%r@r%r@u%r@e%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@J%r@e%r@s%r@u%r@s%r@ %R@C%r@h%r@r%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@a%r@h%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@f%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@k%r@s%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@A%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@n%r@c%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@f%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %u@[%u@a%u@]%i@e%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@y%i@ %i@i%i@m%i@a%i@g%i@i%i@n%i@a%i@b%i@l%i@e%i@ %i@b%i@e%i@i%i@n%i@g…Lit: %i@a%i@l%i@l%i@ %i@f%i@l%i@e%i@s%i@h. An expression and figure of speech used throughout the Bible.%fn~
%u@[%u@b%u@]%I@Y%i@o%i@u%i@r%i@ %i@r%i@e%i@p%i@u%i@t%i@a%i@t%i@i%i@o%i@n%i@ %i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@e%i@v%i@e%i@r%i@y%i@t%i@h%i@i%i@n%i@g%i@ %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@ %i@s%i@t%i@a%i@n%i@d%i@ %i@f%i@o%i@r…Lit: %i@y%i@o%i@u%i@r%i@ %I@N%i@a%i@m%i@e%fn~

Some liberties taken.%fn~
